word.kjv: And of the children of Issachar, which were men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do; the heads of them were two hundred; and all their brethren were at their commandment.
word.thailand: จากคนอิสสาคาร์ มีผู้รู้กาละ ทราบว่าอิสราเอลควรทำประการใด มีหัวหน้าสองร้อยคน และญาติของเขาทั้งสิ้นอยู่ใต้บังคับบัญชาของเขา
word.spanish1909: Y de los hijos de Issachâr, doscientos principales, entendidos en los tiempos, y que sabían lo que Israel debía hacer, cuyo dicho seguían todos sus hermanos.
word.latinvulgate: De filiis quoque Issachar viri eruditi, qui noverant singula tempora ad præcipiendum quid facere deberet Israël, principes ducenti : omnis autem reliqua tribus eorum consilium sequebatur.
word.italian1927: Dei figliuoli d’Issacar, che intendevano i tempi, in modo da sapere quel che Israele dovea fare, duecento capi, e tutti i loro fratelli sotto i loro ordini.
word.german1912: der Kinder Isaschar, die verständig waren und rieten, was zu der Zeit Israel tun sollte, zweihundert Hauptleute; und alle ihre Brüder folgten ihrem Wort; {~}
word.french1910: Des fils d'Issacar, ayant l'intelligence des temps pour savoir ce que devait faire Israël, deux cents chefs, et tous leurs frères sous leurs ordres.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以薩迦支派的子孫中，通曉時勢和知道以色列當怎樣行的，共有二百個首領；他們所有的親族都聽從他們的命令。
word.korean: 잇사갈 자손 중에서 시세를 알고 이스라엘이 마땅히 행할 것을 아는 두목이 이백명이니 저희는 그 모든 형제를 관할하는 자며
word.tagalog: At sa mga anak ni Issachar, na mga lalaking maalam ng mga panahon, upang matalastas kung ano ang marapat gawin ng Israel; ang mga pinuno sa kanila ay dalawang daan; at ang lahat nilang kapatid ay nasa kanilang utos.
word.maori: Na, o nga tama a Ihakara, he hunga mohio ki nga wa, i mohio ai ki nga mahi ma Iharaira; e rua rau o ratou ariki; kei o enei mangai ano he tikanga mo o ratou teina.
word.cebuano: Ug sa mga anak ni Issachar, mga tawo nga may salabutan sa mga panahon, sa pagpanghibalo sa pagabuhaton sa Israel, ang mga pangulo nila duha ka gatus; ug ang tanan nilang kaigsoonan diha sa ilang pagbulot-an.
word.hebrew: לב ומחצי מטה מנשה שמונה עשר אלף אשר נקבו בשמות לבוא להמליך את דויד  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: ומבני יששכר יודעי בינה לעתים לדעת מה יעשה ישראל ראשיהם מאתים וכל אחיהם על פיהם׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἀπὸ τοῦ ἡμίσους φυλῆς μανασση δέκα ὀκτὼ χιλιάδες οἳ ὠνομάσθησαν ἐν ὀνόματι τοῦ βασιλεῦσαι τὸν δαυιδ

word.kjv: Only the LORD give thee wisdom and understanding, and give thee charge concerning Israel, that thou mayest keep the law of the LORD thy God.
word.thailand: ขอเพียงพระเยโฮวาห์ประสาทให้เจ้ามีความเฉลียวฉลาดและความเข้าใจ และทรงตั้งเจ้าให้ปกครองอิสราเอลและทรงโปรดให้เจ้ารักษาพระราชบัญญัติของพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Y Jehová te dé entendimiento y prudencia, y él te dé mandamientos para Israel; y que tú guardes la ley de Jehová tu Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Det quoque Dominus prudentiam et sensum ut regere possis Israël, et custodire legem Domini Dei tui.
word.italian1927: Sol diati l’Eterno senno e intelligenza, e ti costituisca re d’Israele, per osservare la legge dell’Eterno, del tuo Dio.
word.german1912: Auch wird der HERR dir geben Klugheit und Verstand und wird dir Israel befehlen, daß du haltest das Gesetz des HERRN, deines Gottes.
word.french1910: Veuille seulement l'Eternel t'accorder de la sagesse et de l'intelligence, et te faire régner sur Israël dans l'observation de la loi de l'Eternel, ton Dieu!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 如果你謹守遵行耶和華吩咐摩西向以色列人頒布的律例和典章，這樣你就必亨通。你要堅強勇敢，不要懼怕，也不要驚惶。
word.korean: 여호와께서 네게 지혜와 총명을 주사 너로 이스라엘을 다스리게 하시고 너의 하나님 여호와의 율법을 지키게 하시기를 더욱 원하노라
word.tagalog: Pagkalooban ka lamang ng Panginoon ng pagmumunimuni, at pagkakilala, at bigyan ka niya ng bilin tungkol sa Israel; na anopa't iyong maingatan ang kautusan ng Panginoon mong Dios.
word.maori: Kia homai ano ia e Ihowa he ngakau whakaaro, he mohio, ki a koe, kia whakahaua e ia ki a koe he tikanga mo Iharaira; kia puritia ai e koe te ture a Ihowa, a tou Atua,
word.cebuano: Si Jehova lamang ang magahatag kanimo sa kaalam ug salabutan, ug magahatag kanimo sa mga sugo mahitungod sa Israel; aron ikaw magabantay sa Kasugoan ni Jehova nga imong Dios.
word.hebrew: יב אך יתן לך יהוה שכל ובינה ויצוך על ישראל ולשמור את תורת יהוה אלהיך
word.hebrewmodern: אך יתן לך יהוה שכל ובינה ויצוך על ישראל ולשמור את תורת יהוה אלהיך׃
word.greekot: ἀλλ' ἢ δῴη σοι σοφίαν καὶ σύνεσιν κύριος καὶ κατισχύσαι σε ἐπὶ ισραηλ καὶ τοῦ φυλάσσεσθαι καὶ τοῦ ποιεῖν τὸν νόμον κυρίου τοῦ θεοῦ σου

word.kjv: Huram said moreover, Blessed be the LORD God of Israel, that made heaven and earth, who hath given to David the king a wise son, endued with prudence and understanding, that might build an house for the LORD, and an house for his kingdom.
word.thailand: หุรามตรัสอีกว่า "สาธุการแด่พระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าแห่งอิสราเอล ผู้ทรงสร้างฟ้าสวรรค์และแผ่นดินโลก ผู้ได้ประทานโอรสที่ฉลาดคนหนึ่งแก่ดาวิดกอปรด้วยความเฉลียวฉลาดและความเข้าใจ ผู้ซึ่งจะสร้างพระนิเวศถวายพระเยโฮวาห์ และสร้างพระราชวังเพื่อราชอาณาจักรของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Y además decía Hiram: Bendito sea Jehová el Dios de Israel, que hizo los cielos y la tierra, y que dió al rey David hijo sabio, entendido, cuerdo y prudente, que edifique casa á Jehová, y casa para su reino.
word.latinvulgate: Et addidit, dicens : Benedictus Dominus Deus Israël, qui fecit cælum et terram : qui dedit David regi filium sapientem et eruditum et sensatum atque prudentem, ut ædificaret domum Domino, et palatium sibi.
word.italian1927: Huram aggiunse: "Benedetto sia l’Eterno, l’Iddio d’Israele, che ha fatto i cieli e la terra, perché ha dato al re Davide un figliuolo savio, pieno di senno e d’intelligenza, il quale edificherà una casa per l’Eterno, e una casa reale per sé!
word.german1912: Und Huram sprach weiter: Gelobt sei der HERR, der Gott Israels, der da Himmel und Erde gemacht hat, daß er dem König David hat einen weisen, klugen und verständigen Sohn gegeben, der dem HERRN ein Haus baue und ein Haus seines Königreichs.
word.french1910: Huram dit encore: Béni soit l'Eternel, le Dieu d'Israël, qui a fait les cieux et la terre, de ce qu'il a donné au roi David un fils sage, prudent et intelligent, qui va bâtir une maison à l'Eternel et une maison royale pour lui!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 希蘭又說：“創造天地的耶和華以色列的　神，是應當稱頌的！因為他賜給大衛王一個有智慧的兒子，有聰明有見識，可以為耶和華建造殿宇，為自己建造王宮。
word.korean: 또 가로되 천지를 지으신 이스라엘 하나님 여호와는 송축을 받으실지로다 다윗 왕에게 지혜로운 아들을 주시고 명철과 총명을 품부하시사 능히 여호와를 위하여 전을 건축하고 자기 권영을 위하여 궁궐을 건축하게 하시도다
word.tagalog: Sinabi ni Hiram bukod dito, Purihin ang Panginoon, ang Dios ng Israel, na lumikha ng langit at lupa, na nagbigay kay David na hari ng isang pantas na anak, na may bait at kaalaman, na ipagtatayo ng isang bahay ang Panginoon, at ng isang bahay ang kaniyang kaharian.
word.maori: I mea ano a Hurama, Kia whakapaingia a Ihowa, te Atua o Iharaira, nana nei i hanga te rangi me te whenua, nana hoki i homai ki a Kingi Rawiri he tama ngarahu tika, e hua ana ona whakaaro, tona mohio, hei hanga i te whare mo Ihowa, i te whare ano mo tona kingitanga.
word.cebuano: Labut pa, si Huram miingon: Dalayegon si Jehova, ang Dios sa Israel, nga nagbuhat sa langit ug yuta, nga mihatag kang David nga hari sa usa ka maalam nga anak nga lalake, hinatagan sa pagkabuotan ug pagsabut, nga magatukod sa usa ka balay alang kang Jehova, ug usa ka balay alang sa iyang gingharian.
word.hebrew: יב ועתה שלחתי איש חכם יודע בינה--לחורם אבי
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר חורם ברוך יהוה אלהי ישראל אשר עשה את השמים ואת הארץ אשר נתן לדויד המלך בן חכם יודע שכל ובינה אשר יבנה בית ליהוה ובית למלכותו׃
word.greekot: καὶ νῦν ἀπέσταλκά σοι ἄνδρα σοφὸν καὶ εἰδότα σύνεσιν τὸν χιραμ τὸν πατέρα μου

word.kjv: And now I have sent a cunning man, endued with understanding, of Huram my father's,
word.thailand: บัดนี้ข้าพเจ้าได้ส่งช่างฝีมือคนหนึ่ง กอปรด้วยความเข้าใจ คือหุรามที่ปรึกษาอาวุโส
word.spanish1909: Yo pues te he enviado un hombre hábil y entendido, que fué de Hiram mi padre,
word.latinvulgate: Misi ergo tibi virum prudentem et scientissimum Hiram patrem meum,
word.italian1927: Io ti mando dunque un uomo abile e intelligente, maestro Huram,
word.german1912: So sende ich nun einen weisen Mann, der Verstand hat, Huram, meinen Meister
word.french1910: Je t'envoie donc un homme habile et intelligent, Huram-Abi,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 現在我派一個技藝精巧、滿有聰明的人來，他是我父親希蘭的匠人。
word.korean: 내가 이제 공교하고 총명한 사람을 보내오니 전에 내 부친 후람에게 속하였던 자라
word.tagalog: At ngayo'y nagsugo ako ng bihasang lalake na may kaalaman, kay Hiram na aking ama,
word.maori: Na kua unga atu nei e ahau tetahi tangata whakaaro, e hua ana tona mohio, na toku papa, na Hurama,
word.cebuano: Ug karon ako nagpadala ug usa ka batid nga tawo, nga tinugahan sa pagkamasinabuton, gikan kang Huram nga akong amahan,
word.hebrew: יג בן אשה מן בנות דן ואביו איש צרי יודע לעשות בזהב ובכסף בנחשת בברזל באבנים ובעצים בארגמן בתכלת ובבוץ ובכרמיל ולפתח כל פתוח ולחשב כל מחשבת--אשר ינתן לו עם חכמיך וחכמי אדני דויד אביך
word.hebrewmodern: ועתה שלחתי איש חכם יודע בינה לחורם אבי׃
word.greekot: ἡ μήτηρ αὐτοῦ ἀπὸ θυγατέρων δαν καὶ ὁ πατὴρ αὐτοῦ ἀνὴρ τύριος εἰδότα ποιῆσαι ἐν χρυσίῳ καὶ ἐν ἀργυρίῳ καὶ ἐν χαλκῷ καὶ ἐν σιδήρῳ ἐν λίθοις καὶ ξύλοις καὶ ὑφαίνειν ἐν τῇ πορφύρᾳ καὶ ἐν τῇ ὑακίνθῳ καὶ ἐν τῇ βύσσῳ καὶ ἐν τῷ κοκκίνῳ καὶ γλύψαι γλυφὰς καὶ διανοεῖσθαι πᾶσαν διανόησιν ὅσα ἂν δῷς αὐτῷ μετὰ τῶν σοφῶν σου καὶ σοφῶν δαυιδ κυρίου μου πατρός σου

word.kjv: And he sought God in the days of Zechariah, who had understanding in the visions of God: and as long as he sought the LORD, God made him to prosper.
word.thailand: และพระองค์ทรงแสวงหาพระเจ้าในสมัยของเศคาริยาห์ ผู้เข้าใจในนิมิตต่างๆจากพระเจ้า และตราบใดที่พระองค์แสวงหาพระเยโฮวาห์ พระเจ้าทรงกระทำให้พระองค์เจริญ
word.spanish1909: Y persistió en buscar á Dios en los días de Zachârías, entendido en visiones de Dios; y en estos días que él buscó á Jehová, él le prosperó.
word.latinvulgate: Et exquisivit Dominum in diebus Zachariæ intelligentis et videntis Deum : cumque requireret Dominum, direxit eum in omnibus.
word.italian1927: Si diè con diligenza a cercare Iddio mentre visse Zaccaria, che avea l’intelligenza delle visioni di Dio; e finché cercò l’Eterno, Iddio lo fece prosperare.
word.german1912: Und er suchte Gott, solange Sacharja lebte, der Lehrer in den Gesichten Gottes; und solange er den HERRN suchte, ließ es ihm Gott gelingen.
word.french1910: Il s'appliqua à rechercher Dieu pendant la vie de Zacharie, qui avait l'intelligence des visions de Dieu; et dans le temps où il rechercha l'Eternel, Dieu le fit prospérer.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 撒迦利亞在世的日子，教導烏西雅敬畏　神，所以烏西雅常常尋求　神；烏西雅尋求　神的時候，　神就使他亨通。
word.korean: 마레사 사람 도다와후의 아들 엘리에셀이 여호사밧을 향하여 예언하여 가로되 '왕이 아하시야와 교제하는고로 여호와께서 왕의 지은 것을 파하시리라' 하더니 이에 그 배가 파상하여 다시스로 가지 못하였더라
word.tagalog: At siya'y tumalagang hanapin ang Dios sa mga kaarawan ni Zacharias, na siyang maalam sa pangitain sa Dios: at habang kaniyang hinahanap ang Panginoon, pinagiginhawa siya ng Dios.
word.maori: I rapua e ia ta te Atua i nga ra o Hakaraia, he tangata mohio tera i nga whakakitenga mai a te Atua. Na i nga ra i rapua ai e ia ta Ihowa, ka meinga ia e te Atua kia kake.
word.cebuano: Ug nagpadayon siya sa iyang kaugalingon sa pagpangita sa Dios sa mga adlaw ni Zacharias, nga may salabutan sa panan-awon sa Dios: ug sa kadugayon nga siya nangita kang Jehova, ang Dios naghimo kaniya nga mauswagon.
word.hebrew: ה ויהי לדרש אלהים בימי זכריהו המבין בראת האלהים ובימי דרשו את יהוה הצליחו האלהים
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי לדרש אלהים בימי זכריהו המבין בראת האלהים ובימי דרשו את יהוה הצליחו האלהים׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἦν ἐκζητῶν τὸν κύριον ἐν ταῖς ἡμέραις ζαχαριου τοῦ συνίοντος ἐν φόβῳ κυρίου καὶ ἐν ταῖς ἡμέραις αὐτοῦ ἐζήτησεν τὸν κύριον καὶ εὐόδωσεν αὐτῷ κύριος

word.kjv: Then sent I for Eliezer, for Ariel, for Shemaiah, and for Elnathan, and for Jarib, and for Elnathan, and for Nathan, and for Zechariah, and for Meshullam, chief men; also for Joiarib, and for Elnathan, men of understanding.
word.thailand: แล้วข้าพเจ้าจึงให้ไปเรียกเอลีเยเซอร์ อารีเอล เชไมยาห์ เอลนาธัน ยารีบ เอลนาธัน นาธัน เศคาริยาห์ และเมชุลลาม บุคคลชั้นหัวหน้า และให้หาโยยาริบ และเอลนาธัน ผู้เป็นคนมีความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Entonces despaché á Eliezer, y á Ariel, y á Semaías, y á Elnathán, y á Jarib, y á Elnathán, y á Nathán, y á Zacarías, y á Mesullam, principales; asimismo á Joiarib y á Elnathán, hombres doctos;
word.latinvulgate: Itaque misi Eliezer, et Ariel, et Semeiam, et Elnathan, et Jarib, et alterum Elnathan, et Nathan, et Zachariam, et Mosollam principes : et Joiarib, et Elnathan sapientes.
word.italian1927: Allora feci chiamare i capi Eliezer, Ariel, Scemaia, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Zaccaria, Meshullam, e i dottori Joiarib ed Elnathan,
word.german1912: Da sandte ich hin Elieser, Ariel, Semaja, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Sacharja und Mesullam, die Obersten, und Jojarib und Elnathan, die Lehrer,
word.french1910: Alors je fis appeler les chefs Eliézer, Ariel, Schemaeja, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Zacharie et Meschullam, et les docteurs Jojarib et Elnathan.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 於是我把首領以利以謝、亞列、示瑪雅、以利拿單、雅立、以利拿單、拿單、撒迦利亞和米書蘭召來，也把有學問的教師約雅立和以利拿單召來，
word.korean: 이에 모든 족장 곧 엘리에셀과, 아리엘과, 스마야와, 엘라단과, 야립과, 엘라단과, 나단과, 스가랴와, 므술람을 부르고 또 명철한 사람 요야립과 엘라단을 불러
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y ipinasundo ko si Eliezer, si Ariel, si Semaias, at si Elnathan, at si Jarib, at si Elnathan, at si Nathan, at si Zacarias, at si Mesullam, na mga pangulong lalake; gayon din si Joiarib, at si Elnathan, na mga tagapagturo.
word.maori: Katahi ahau ka tono kia tikina a Erietere, a Ariere, a Hemaia, a Erenatana, a Iaripi, a Erenatana, a Natana, a Hakaraia, a Mehurama, he upoko enei; a Toiaripi ano a Erenatana, he kaiwhakaako raua.
word.cebuano: Unya akong gipakuha si Eliezer, si Ariel, si Semaias, ug si Elnathan, ug si Jarib, ug si Elnathan, ug si Nathan, ug si Zacharias, ug si Mesullam, mga tawo nga pangulo; si Joiarib usab, ug si Elnathan, nga mga magtutudlo.
word.hebrew: טז ואשלחה לאליעזר לאריאל לשמעיה ולאלנתן וליריב ולאלנתן ולנתן ולזכריה ולמשלם--ראשים וליויריב ולאלנתן מבינים
word.hebrewmodern: ואשלחה לאליעזר לאריאל לשמעיה ולאלנתן וליריב ולאלנתן ולנתן ולזכריה ולמשלם ראשים וליויריב ולאלנתן מבינים׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἀπέστειλα τῷ ελεαζαρ τῷ αριηλ τῷ σαμαια καὶ τῷ αλωναμ καὶ τῷ ιαριβ καὶ τῷ ελναθαν καὶ τῷ ναθαν καὶ τῷ ζαχαρια καὶ τῷ μεσουλαμ ἄνδρας καὶ τῷ ιωαριβ καὶ τῷ ελναθαν συνίοντας

word.kjv: And by the good hand of our God upon us they brought us a man of understanding, of the sons of Mahli, the son of Levi, the son of Israel; and Sherebiah, with his sons and his brethren, eighteen;
word.thailand: และโดยพระหัตถ์อันทรงพระคุณของพระเจ้าของเราอยู่กับเรา เขาได้นำคนที่มีความสุขุมมาให้เรา เป็นลูกหลานของมาห์ลีบุตรชายเลวี ผู้เป็นบุตรชายอิสราเอล ชื่อเชเรบิยาห์ กับบุตรชายและญาติพี่น้อง รวมสิบแปดคน
word.spanish1909: Y trajéronnos, según la buena mano de nuestro Dios sobre nosotros, un varón entendido de los hijos de Mahalí, hijo de Leví, hijo de Israel; y á Serabías con sus hijos y sus hermanos, dieciocho;
word.latinvulgate: Et adduxerunt nobis per manum Dei nostri bonam super nos, virum doctissimum de filiis Moholi filii Levi, filii Israël, et Sarabiam et filios ejus et fratres ejus decem et octo,
word.italian1927: E siccome la benefica mano del nostro Dio era su noi, ci menarono Scerebia, uomo intelligente, dei figliuoli di Mahli, figliuolo di Levi, figliuolo d’Israele, e con lui i suoi figliuoli e i suoi fratelli; in numero di diciotto;
word.german1912: Und sie brachten uns, nach der guten Hand unsres Gottes über uns, einen klugen Mann aus den Kindern Maheli, des Sohnes Levis, des Sohnes Israels, und Serebja mit seinen Söhnen und Brüdern, achtzehn,
word.french1910: Et, comme la bonne main de notre Dieu était sur nous, ils nous amenèrent Schérébia, homme de sens, d'entre les fils de Machli, fils de Lévi, fils d'Israël, et avec lui ses fils et ses frères, au nombre de dix-huit;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為我們　神施恩的手幫助我們，他們就從以色列的曾孫、利未的孫子、抹利的子孫中帶一個敏悟的人到我們這裡來；還有示利比和他的兒子，以及他們的兄弟，共十八人。
word.korean: 우리 하나님의 선한 손의 도우심을 입고 저희가 이스라엘의 손자 레위의 아들 말리의 자손 중에서 한 명철한 사람을 데려오고 또 세레뱌와 그 아들들과 형제 십 팔명과
word.tagalog: At ayon sa mabuting kamay ng ating Dios na sumasa atin ay nagdala sila sa atin ng isang lalake na matalino, sa mga anak ni Mahali, na anak ni Levi, na anak ni Israel; at si Serebias, pati ng kaniyang mga anak na lalake at mga kapatid, labing walo:
word.maori: Na i runga i a matou te ringa pai o to matou Atua, a ka kawea mai e ratou ki a matou he tangata whai whakaaro, no nga tama a Mahari, tama a Riwai, tama a Iharaira; a Herepia ano ratou ko ana tama, ko ona tuakana, teina, kotahi tekau ma waru;
word.cebuano: Ug sumala sa maayong pagmando sa atong Dios kanato, sila nagdala nganhi kanato usa ka tawo nga mabuot, gikan sa mga anak nga lalake ni Mahali, anak nga lalake ni Levi, anak nga lalake sa Israel; ug si Serabias, uban ang iyang mga anak nga lalake ug ang iyang mga kaigsoonan, napulo ug walo,
word.hebrew: יח ויביאו לנו כיד אלהינו הטובה עלינו איש שכל--מבני מחלי בן לוי בן ישראל ושרביה ובניו ואחיו שמנה עשר
word.hebrewmodern: ויביאו לנו כיד אלהינו הטובה עלינו איש שכל מבני מחלי בן לוי בן ישראל ושרביה ובניו ואחיו שמנה עשר׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἤλθοσαν ἡμῖν ὡς χεὶρ θεοῦ ἡμῶν ἀγαθὴ ἐφ' ἡμᾶς ἀνὴρ σαχωλ ἀπὸ υἱῶν μοολι υἱοῦ λευι υἱοῦ ισραηλ καὶ ἀρχὴν ἤλθοσαν υἱοὶ αὐτοῦ καὶ ἀδελφοὶ αὐτοῦ ὀκτωκαίδεκα

word.kjv: And Ezra the priest brought the law before the congregation both of men and women, and all that could hear with understanding, upon the first day of the seventh month.
word.thailand: เอสราปุโรหิตได้นำพระราชบัญญัติมาหน้าชุมนุมชน ทั้งชายและหญิง และบรรดาผู้ที่ฟังเข้าใจได้ ณ วันต้นของเดือนที่เจ็ด
word.spanish1909: Y Esdras el sacerdote, trajo la ley delante de la congregación, así de hombres como de mujeres, y de todo entendido para escuchar, el primer día del mes séptimo.
word.latinvulgate: Attulit ergo Esdras sacerdos legem coram multitudine virorum et mulierum, cunctisque qui poterant intelligere, in die prima mensis septimi.
word.italian1927: E il primo giorno del settimo mese, il sacerdote Esdra portò la legge davanti alla raunanza, composta d’uomini, di donne e di tutti quelli ch’eran capaci d’intendere.
word.german1912: Und Esra, der Priester, brachte das Gesetz vor die Gemeinde, Männer und Weiber und alle, die es vernehmen konnten, am ersten Tage des siebenten Monats{~}
word.french1910: Et le sacrificateur Esdras apporta la loi devant l'assemblée, composée d'hommes et de femmes et de tous ceux qui étaient capables de l'entendre. C'était le premier jour du septième mois.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 七月初一日，以斯拉祭司把律法書帶到所有聽了能明白的男女會眾面前。
word.korean: 칠월 일일에 제사장 에스라가 율법책을 가지고 남자 여자 무릇 알아 들을 만한 회중 앞에 이르러
word.tagalog: At dinala ni Ezra na saserdote ang aklat ng kautusan sa harap ng kapisanan, na mga lalake at mga babae, at lahat na makadidinig na may kaalaman nang unang araw ng ikapitong buwan.
word.maori: Na ka mauria mai e Etera tohunga te ture ki te aroaro o te whakaminenga, o te tane, o te wahine, o te hunga katoa e mohio ana ki te whakarongo, i te ra tuatahi o te whitu o nga marama.
word.cebuano: Ug gidala ni Esdras nga sacerdote ang Kasugoan sa atubangan sa katilingban, mga lalake ug mga babaye, ug ang tanan nga makadungog nga adunay pagsabut, sa nahaunang adlaw sa ikapito ka bulan.
word.hebrew: ב ויביא עזרא הכהן את התורה לפני הקהל מאיש ועד אשה וכל מבין לשמע--ביום אחד לחדש השביעי
word.hebrewmodern: ויביא עזרא הכהן את התורה לפני הקהל מאיש ועד אשה וכל מבין לשמע ביום אחד לחדש השביעי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And the rest of the people, the priests, the Levites, the porters, the singers, the Nethinims, and all they that had separated themselves from the people of the lands unto the law of God, their wives, their sons, and their daughters, every one having knowledge, and having understanding;
word.thailand: ส่วนประชาชนนอกนั้น บรรดาปุโรหิต คนเลวี คนเฝ้าประตู นักร้อง คนใช้ประจำพระวิหาร และคนทั้งปวงผู้ได้แยกตัวออกจากชนชาติทั้งหลายของแผ่นดินเหล่านั้นมาถือพระราชบัญญัติของพระเจ้า ทั้งภรรยาของเขา บุตรชายบุตรสาวของเขา และคนทั้งปวงผู้มีความรู้และความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Y el resto del pueblo, los sacerdotes, Levitas, porteros, y cantores, Nethineos, y todos los que se habían apartado de los pueblos de las tierras á la ley de Dios, sus mujeres, sus hijos y sus hijas, y todo el que tenía comprensión y discernimiento,
word.latinvulgate: Et reliqui de populo, sacerdotes, Levitæ, janitores, et cantores, Nathinæi, et omnes qui se separaverunt de populis terrarum ad legem Dei, uxores eorum, filii eorum, et filiæ eorum,
word.italian1927: Il resto del popolo, i sacerdoti, i Leviti, i portinai, i cantori, i Nethinei e tutti quelli che s’eran separati dai popoli dei paesi stranieri per aderire alla legge di Dio, le loro mogli, i loro figliuoli e le loro figliuole, tutti quelli che aveano conoscimento e intelligenza,
word.german1912: Und das andere Volk, Priester, Leviten, Torhüter, Sänger, Tempelknechte und alle, die sich von den Völker in den Landen abgesondert hatten zum Gesetz Gottes, samt ihren Weibern, Söhnen und Töchtern, alle, die es verstehen konnten,
word.french1910: Le reste du peuple, les sacrificateurs, les Lévites, les portiers, les chantres, les Néthiniens, et tous ceux qui s'étaient séparés des peuples étrangers pour suivre la loi de Dieu, leurs femmes, leurs fils et leurs filles, tous ceux qui étaient capables de connaissance et d'intelligence,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 約的內容：謹守摩西的律法其餘的民眾：祭司、利未人、守門的、歌唱的、作殿役的，以及一切跟各地民族分離，歸向　神律法的和他們的妻子和兒女，所有有知識能夠明白的，
word.korean: 그 남은 백성과 제사장들과, 레위 사람들과, 문지기들과, 노래하는 자들과, 느디님 사람들과, 및 이방 사람과 절교하고 하나님의 율법을 준행하는 모든 자와 그 아내와 그 자녀들 무릇 지식과 총명이 있는 자가
word.tagalog: At ang nalabi sa bayan, ang mga saserdote, ang mga Levita, ang mga tagatanod-pinto, ang mga mangaawit, ang mga Nethineo, at lahat ng nagsihiwalay sa mga bayan ng mga lupain sa kautusan ng Dios, ang kanilang mga asawa, ang kanilang mga anak, na lalake at babae, bawa't may kaalaman at kaunawaan;
word.maori: Na, ko era atu o te iwi, ko nga tohunga, ko nga Riwaiti, ko nga kaitiaki kuwaha, ko nga kaiwaiata, ko nga Netinimi, me te hunga katoa i wehea i roto i nga iwi o nga whenua ki te ture a te Atua, ko a ratou wahine, ko a ratou tama, ko a ratou tama hine, ko te hunga katoa i mohio, i whai whakaaro;
word.cebuano: Ug ang uban sa katawohan, ang mga sacerdote, ang mga Levihanon, ang mga magbalantay sa pultahan, ang mga mag-aawit, ang mga Nethinhanon, ug silang tanan nga namulag sa ilang kaugalingon gikan sa mga katawohan sa mga yuta, ngadto sa Kasugoan sa Dios, ang ilang mga asawa, ang ilang mga anak nga lalake, ug ang ilang mga anak nga babaye, ang tagsatagsa nga may kahibalo ug may salabutan.
word.hebrew: כח מלוך חרם בענה
word.hebrewmodern: ושאר העם הכהנים הלוים השוערים המשררים הנתינים וכל הנבדל מעמי הארצות אל תורת האלהים נשיהם בניהם ובנתיהם כל יודע מבין׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But I have understanding as well as you; I am not inferior to you: yea, who knoweth not such things as these?
word.thailand: แต่ข้าก็มีความเข้าใจอย่างกับท่าน ข้าไม่ด้อยกว่าท่าน เออ เรื่องอย่างนี้ใครจะไม่ทราบ
word.spanish1909: También tengo yo seso como vosotros; No soy yo menos que vosotros: ¿Y quién habrá que no pueda decir otro tanto?
word.latinvulgate: Et mihi est cor sicut et vobis, nec inferior vestri sum ; quis enim hæc quæ nostis ignorat ?
word.italian1927: Ma del senno ne ho anch’io al par di voi, non vi son punto inferiore; e cose come codeste chi non le sa?
word.german1912: Ich habe so wohl ein Herz als ihr und bin nicht geringer denn ihr; und wer ist, der solches nicht wisse?
word.french1910: J'ai tout aussi bien que vous de l'intelligence, moi, Je ne vous suis point inférieur; Et qui ne sait les choses que vous dites?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但我也有聰明像你們一樣，我並非不及你們，像你們所說的這些事，有誰不曉得呢？
word.korean: 나도 너희 같이 총명이 있어 너희만 못하지 아니하니 그같은 일을 누가 알지 못하겠느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Nguni't ako'y may pagkaunawang gaya ninyo: Hindi ako huli sa inyo: Oo, sinong hindi nakaalam ng mga bagay na gaya nito?
word.maori: Otira kei ahau ano hoki he ngakau, he pera ano me o koutou, kihai ahau i hoki iho i a koutou: ko wai ra te he ana ki enei mea?
word.cebuano: Apan ako may salabutan nga maingon kaninyo; Ako dili ubos kaninyo: Oo, kinsa ang wala mangasayud sa mga butang nga sama niini?
word.hebrew: ג  גם-לי לבב כמוכם--לא-נפל אנכי מכם    ואת-מי-אין כמו-אלה
word.hebrewmodern: גם לי לבב כמוכם לא נפל אנכי מכם ואת מי אין כמו אלה׃
word.greekot: κἀμοὶ μὲν καρδία καθ' ὑμᾶς ἐστιν

word.kjv: With the ancient is wisdom; and in length of days understanding.
word.thailand: สติปัญญาอยู่กับคนมีอายุมาก และอายุยืนยาวทำให้เกิดความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: En los viejos está la ciencia, Y en la larga edad la inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: In antiquis est sapientia, et in multo tempore prudentia.
word.italian1927: Nei vecchi si trova la sapienza e lunghezza di giorni da intelligenza.
word.german1912: Ja, "bei den Großvätern ist die Weisheit, und der Verstand bei den Alten".
word.french1910: Dans les vieillards se trouve la sagesse, Et dans une longue vie l'intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們說：老年的有智慧，長壽的有聰明。
word.korean: 늙은 자에게는 지혜가 있고 장수하는 자에게는 명철이 있느니라
word.tagalog: Nasa mga matanda ang karunungan, at sa kagulangan ang unawa.
word.maori: ¶ Kei nga kaumatua nga whakaaro nui; kei te roa o nga ra te matau.
word.cebuano: Ang kaalam anaa sa mga tawong tigulang, Ug ang kataas sa mga adlaw anaa sa maayong pagsabut.
word.hebrew: יב  בישישים חכמה    וארך ימים תבונה
word.hebrewmodern: בישישים חכמה וארך ימים תבונה׃
word.greekot: ἐν πολλῷ χρόνῳ σοφία ἐν δὲ πολλῷ βίῳ ἐπιστήμη

word.kjv: With him is wisdom and strength, he hath counsel and understanding.
word.thailand: สติปัญญาและฤทธานุภาพอยู่กับพระเจ้า พระองค์ทรงมีคำแนะนำและความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Con Dios está la sabiduría y la fortaleza; Suyo es el consejo y la inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Apud ipsum est sapientia et fortitudo ; ipse habet consilium et intelligentiam.
word.italian1927: Ma in Dio stanno la saviezza e la potenza, a lui appartengono il consiglio e l’intelligenza.
word.german1912: Bei ihm ist Weisheit und Gewalt, Rat und Verstand.
word.french1910: En Dieu résident la sagesse et la puissance. Le conseil et l'intelligence lui appartiennent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 陳述　神的智慧與能力他有智慧與能力，又有謀略與聰明。
word.korean: 지혜와 권능이 하나님께 있고 모략과 명철도 그에게 속하였나니
word.tagalog: Nasa Dios ang karunungan at kakayahan; kaniya ang payo at pagkaunawa.
word.maori: Kei a ia te whakaaro nui me te kaha; kei a ia te tohutohu me te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Sa Dios anaa ang kaalam ug ang kagahum; Ang tambag ug ang pagsabut anaa kaniya.
word.hebrew: יג  עמו חכמה וגבורה    לו עצה ותבונה
word.hebrewmodern: עמו חכמה וגבורה לו עצה ותבונה׃
word.greekot: παρ' αὐτῷ σοφία καὶ δύναμις αὐτῷ βουλὴ καὶ σύνεσις

word.kjv: He removeth away the speech of the trusty, and taketh away the understanding of the aged.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงเอาคำพูดไปเสียจากผู้ที่เขาวางใจ และทรงนำการพินิจพิจารณาไปเสียจากพวกผู้มีอายุ
word.spanish1909: El impide el labio á los que dicen verdad, Y quita á los ancianos el consejo.
word.latinvulgate: commutans labium veracium, et doctrinam senum auferens.
word.italian1927: Priva della parola i più eloquenti, e toglie il discernimento ai vecchi.
word.german1912: Er entzieht die Sprache den Bewährten und nimmt weg den Verstand der Alten.
word.french1910: Il ôte la parole à ceux qui ont de l'assurance; Il prive de jugement les vieillards.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他除掉忠信人的言論，又除去老年人的辨別力。
word.korean: 충성된 자의 말을 없이 하시며 늙은 자의 지식을 빼앗으시며
word.tagalog: Kaniyang pinapagbabago ang pananalita ng napagtitiwalaan. At inaalis ang pagkaunawa ng mga matanda.
word.maori: Whakakorea ake e ia he kupu ma te hunga ngakau pono, riro ana i a ia nga mahara o nga kaumatua.
word.cebuano: Siya magapugong sa dila sa matinumanon, Ug ang tigulang iyang pagakuhaan sa salabutan.
word.hebrew: כ  מסיר שפה לנאמנים    וטעם זקנים יקח
word.hebrewmodern: מסיר שפה לנאמנים וטעם זקנים יקח׃
word.greekot: διαλλάσσων χείλη πιστῶν σύνεσιν δὲ πρεσβυτέρων ἔγνω

word.kjv: For thou hast hid their heart from understanding: therefore shalt thou not exalt them.
word.thailand: เพราะพระองค์ทรงปิดใจของเขาทั้งหลายไว้จากความเข้าใจ ฉะนั้นพระองค์จะไม่ทรงยกย่องเขา'
word.spanish1909: Porque á éstos has tú escondido su corazón de inteligencia: Por tanto, no los ensalzarás.
word.latinvulgate: Cor eorum longe fecisti a disciplina : propterea non exaltabuntur.
word.italian1927: Poiché tu hai chiuso il cuor di costoro alla ragione, e però non li farai trionfare.
word.german1912: Denn du hast ihrem Herzen den Verstand verborgen; darum wirst du ihnen den Sieg geben.
word.french1910: Car tu as fermé leur coeur à l'intelligence; Aussi ne les laisseras-tu pas triompher.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你蒙蔽了他們的心，不讓他們明白；因此你必不高舉他們。
word.korean: 주께서 그들의 마음을 가리워 깨닫지 못하게 하셨사오니 그들을 높이지 아니 하시리이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't iyong ikinubli ang kanilang puso sa pagunawa: kaya't hindi mo sila itataas.
word.maori: Kua huna hoki e koe to ratou ngakau kei mohio; na reira e kore koe e whakaneke ake i a ratou.
word.cebuano: Kay gitagoan mo ang ilang mga kasingkasing gikan sa salabutan: Busa ikaw dili motuboy kanila sa itaas.
word.hebrew: ד  כי-לבם צפנת משכל    על-כן לא תרמם
word.hebrewmodern: כי לבם צפנת משכל על כן לא תרמם׃
word.greekot: ὅτι καρδίαν αὐτῶν ἔκρυψας ἀπὸ φρονήσεως διὰ τοῦτο οὐ μὴ ὑψώσῃς αὐτούς

word.kjv: I have heard the check of my reproach, and the spirit of my understanding causeth me to answer.
word.thailand: ข้าได้ฟังคำติเตียนที่สบประมาทแล้ว เพราะเหตุจิตใจข้ารู้เรื่องข้าจึงต้องตอบ
word.spanish1909: La reprensión de mi censura he oído, Y háceme responder el espíritu de mi inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Doctrinam qua me arguis audiam, et spiritus intelligentiæ meæ respondebit mihi.
word.italian1927: Ho udito rimproveri che mi fanno oltraggio; ma lo spirito mio mi darà una risposta assennata.
word.german1912: Denn ich muß hören, wie man mich straft und tadelt; aber der Geist meines Verstandes soll für mich antworten.
word.french1910: J'ai entendu des reproches qui m'outragent; Le souffle de mon intelligence donnera la réplique.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我聽見了那羞辱我的責備，心靈因著我的悟性回答我。
word.korean: 내가 나를 부끄럽게 하는 책망을 들었으므로 나의 슬기로운 마음이 내게 대답하는구나
word.tagalog: Aking narinig ang saway na inilalagay ako sa kahihiyan, at ang diwa ng aking pagkaunawa ay sumasagot sa akin.
word.maori: Kua rongo ahau i te whakahe moku, e pa ai te whakama ki ahau, a na te wairua o toku ngakau mahara te kupu whakahoki ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Nadungog ko ang pagbadlong nga nakahatag kanako ug kaulaw; Ug ang espirutu sa akong salabutan nagapatubag kanako.
word.hebrew: ג  מוסר כלמתי אשמע    ורוח מבינתי יענני
word.hebrewmodern: מוסר כלמתי אשמע ורוח מבינתי יענני׃
word.greekot: παιδείαν ἐντροπῆς μου ἀκούσομαι καὶ πνεῦμα ἐκ τῆς συνέσεως ἀποκρίνεταί μοι

word.kjv: He divideth the sea with his power, and by his understanding he smiteth through the proud.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงปราบทะเลให้สงบด้วยอานุภาพของพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงตีคนจองหองด้วยความเข้าพระทัยของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: El rompe la mar con su poder, Y con su entendimiento hiere la hinchazón suya.
word.latinvulgate: In fortitudine illius repente maria congregata sunt, et prudentia ejus percussit superbum.
word.italian1927: Con la sua forza egli solleva il mare, con la sua intelligenza ne abbatte l’orgoglio.
word.german1912: Von seiner Kraft wird das Meer plötzlich ungestüm, und durch seinen Verstand zerschmettert er Rahab.
word.french1910: Par sa force il soulève la mer, Par son intelligence il en brise l'orgueil.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他以能力攪動大海，以聰明擊傷拉哈伯。
word.korean: 그는 권능으로 바다를 흉용케 하시며 지혜로 라합을 쳐서 파하시며
word.tagalog: Kaniyang pinapag-iinalon ang dagat ng kaniyang kapangyarihan, at sa kaniyang kaalaman ay sinasaktan niya ang Rahab.
word.maori: Ko tona kaha hei whakakorikori i te moana, maru ana te whakakake i tona matauranga.
word.cebuano: Sa iyang kagahum gikutaw niya ang dagat, Ug pinaagi sa iyang salabutan ginadaug niya ang Rahab.
word.hebrew: יב  בכחו רגע הים    ובתובנתו (ובתבונתו) מחץ רהב
word.hebrewmodern: בכחו רגע הים ובתובנתו מחץ רהב׃
word.greekot: ἰσχύι κατέπαυσεν τὴν θάλασσαν ἐπιστήμῃ δὲ ἔτρωσε τὸ κῆτος

word.kjv: But where shall wisdom be found? and where is the place of understanding?
word.thailand: แต่จะพบพระปัญญาที่ไหน และที่ของความเข้าใจอยู่ที่ไหน
word.spanish1909: Empero ¿dónde se hallará la sabiduría? ¿Y dónde está el lugar de la prudencia?
word.latinvulgate: Sapientia vero ubi invenitur ? et quis est locus intelligentiæ ?
word.italian1927: Ma la Sapienza, dove trovarla? E dov’è il luogo della Intelligenza?
word.german1912: Wo will man aber die Weisheit finden? und wo ist die Stätte des Verstandes?
word.french1910: Mais la sagesse, où se trouve-t-elle? Où est la demeure de l'intelligence?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 然而，智慧在何處可尋？聰明之地在哪裡呢？
word.korean: 그러나 지혜는 어디서 얻으며 명철의 곳은 어디인고
word.tagalog: Nguni't saan masusumpungan ang karunungan? At saan naroon ang dako ng pagkaunawa?
word.maori: E kitea ia ki hea te whakaaro nui? kei hea hoki te wahi o te mohio?
word.cebuano: Apan asa ba ang kaalam igkita? Ug hain ba ang pinuy-anan sa salabutan?
word.hebrew: יב  והחכמה מאין תמצא    ואי זה מקום בינה
word.hebrewmodern: והחכמה מאין תמצא ואי זה מקום בינה׃
word.greekot: ἡ δὲ σοφία πόθεν εὑρέθη ποῖος δὲ τόπος ἐστὶν τῆς ἐπιστήμης

word.kjv: Whence then cometh wisdom? and where is the place of understanding?
word.thailand: ดังนั้นพระปัญญามาจากไหนเล่า และที่ของความเข้าใจอยู่ที่ไหน
word.spanish1909: ¿De dónde pues vendrá la sabiduría? ¿Y dónde está el lugar de la inteligencia?
word.latinvulgate: Unde ergo sapientia venit ? et quis est locus intelligentiæ ?
word.italian1927: Donde vien dunque la Sapienza? E dov’è il luogo della Intelligenza?
word.german1912: Woher kommt denn die Weisheit? und wo ist die Stätte des Verstandes?
word.french1910: D'où vient donc la sagesse? Où est la demeure de l'intelligence?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 然而，智慧從哪裡來，聰明之地在哪裡呢？
word.korean: 그런즉 지혜는 어디서 오며 명철의 곳은 어디인고
word.tagalog: Saan nanggagaling nga ang karunungan? At saan naroon ang dako ng pagkaunawa?
word.maori: ¶ Ka haere mai ra i hea te whakaaro nui? Kei hea te wahi o te matau?
word.cebuano: Diin man diay magagikan ang kaalam? Ug hain man ang dapit sa salabutan?
word.hebrew: כ  והחכמה מאין תבוא    ואי זה מקום בינה
word.hebrewmodern: והחכמה מאין תבוא ואי זה מקום בינה׃
word.greekot: ἡ δὲ σοφία πόθεν εὑρέθη ποῖος δὲ τόπος ἐστὶν τῆς συνέσεως

word.kjv: And unto man he said, Behold, the fear of the Lord, that is wisdom; and to depart from evil is understanding.
word.thailand: และพระองค์ตรัสกับมนุษย์ว่า `ดูเถิด ความยำเกรงองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า นั่นแหละคือพระปัญญา และที่จะหันจากความชั่ว คือความเข้าใจ'"
word.spanish1909: Y dijo al hombre: He aquí que el temor del Señor es la sabiduría, Y el apartarse del mal la inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Et dixit homini : Ecce timor Domini, ipsa est sapientia, et recedere a malo, intelligentia.
word.italian1927: E disse all’uomo: "Ecco: temere il Signore: questa è la Sapienza, e fuggire il male è l’Intelligenza"."
word.german1912: und sprach zu den Menschen: Siehe, die Furcht des HERRN, das ist Weisheit; und meiden das Böse, das ist Verstand.
word.french1910: Puis il dit à l'homme: Voici, la crainte du Seigneur, c'est la sagesse; S'éloigner du mal, c'est l'intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他對人說：‘敬畏主就是智慧，遠離邪惡就是聰明。’”
word.korean: 또 사람에게 이르시기를 주를 경외함이 곧 지혜요, 악을 떠남이 명철이라 ! 하셨느니라
word.tagalog: At sa tao ay sinabi niya, Narito, ang pagkatakot sa Dios ay siyang karunungan; at ang paghiwalay sa kasamaan ay pagkaunawa.
word.maori: A ka mea ia ki te tangata, Na, ko te wehi ki te Ariki, ko te whakaaro nui tena; a ko te mawehe atu i te kino, koia te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ug miingon siya sa tawo: Ania karon, ang kahadlok sa Ginoo, nga mao ang kaalam; Ug ang paglikay sa dautan mao ang salabutan.
word.hebrew: כח  ויאמר לאדם--הן יראת אדני היא חכמה    וסור מרע בינה
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר לאדם הן יראת אדני היא חכמה וסור מרע בינה׃
word.greekot: εἶπεν δὲ ἀνθρώπῳ ἰδοὺ ἡ θεοσέβειά ἐστιν σοφία τὸ δὲ ἀπέχεσθαι ἀπὸ κακῶν ἐστιν ἐπιστήμη

word.kjv: But there is a spirit in man: and the inspiration of the Almighty giveth them understanding.
word.thailand: แต่มีจิตวิญญาณในมนุษย์ การดลใจจากองค์ผู้ทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์กระทำให้เขาเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Ciertamente espíritu hay en el hombre, E inspiración del Omnipotente los hace que entiendan.
word.latinvulgate: Sed, ut video, spiritus est in hominibus, et inspiratio Omnipotentis dat intelligentiam.
word.italian1927: Ma, nell’uomo, quel che lo rende intelligente è lo spirito, è il soffio dell’Onnipotente.
word.german1912: Aber der Geist ist in den Leuten und der Odem des Allmächtigen, der sie verständig macht.
word.french1910: Mais en réalité, dans l'homme, c'est l'esprit, Le souffle du Tout-Puissant, qui donne l'intelligence;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但是在人心裡面有靈，全能者的氣息使人有聰明。
word.korean: 사람의 속에는 심령이 있고 전능자의 기운이 사람에게 총명을 주시나니
word.tagalog: Nguni't may espiritu sa tao, at ang hinga ng Makapangyarihan sa lahat ay nagbibigay sa kanila ng unawa.
word.maori: Otiia he wairua ano to te tangata, na te manawa ano o te Kaha Rawa ratou i whai mahara ai.
word.cebuano: Apan anaay usa ka espiritu diha sa tawo, Ug ang gininhawa sa Makagagahum nagahatag kanila ug salabutan.
word.hebrew: ח  אכן רוח-היא באנוש    ונשמת שדי תבינם
word.hebrewmodern: אכן רוח היא באנוש ונשמת שדי תבינם׃
word.greekot: ἀλλὰ πνεῦμά ἐστιν ἐν βροτοῖς πνοὴ δὲ παντοκράτορός ἐστιν ἡ διδάσκουσα

word.kjv: Therefore hearken unto me, ye men of understanding: far be it from God, that he should do wickedness; and from the Almighty, that he should commit iniquity.
word.thailand: เพราะฉะนั้น ท่านผู้มีความเข้าใจ ขอฟังข้าพเจ้า เมินเสียเถิดที่พระเจ้าจะทรงกระทำความชั่ว และที่องค์ผู้ทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์จะทรงกระทำความชั่วช้า
word.spanish1909: Por tanto, varones de seso, oidme; Lejos esté de Dios la impiedad, Y del Omnipotente la iniquidad.
word.latinvulgate: Ideo, viri cordati, audite me : absit a Deo impietas, et ab Omnipotente iniquitas !
word.italian1927: Ascoltatemi dunque, o uomini di senno! Lungi da Dio il male, lungi dall’Onnipotente l’iniquità!
word.german1912: Darum hört mir zu, ihr weisen Leute: Es sei ferne, daß Gott sollte gottlos handeln und der Allmächtige ungerecht;
word.french1910: Ecoutez-moi donc, hommes de sens! Loin de Dieu l'injustice, Loin du Tout-Puissant l'iniquité!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神是公義的所以，明理的人哪！你們要聽我的話，　神決不至作惡，全能者斷不至行不義，
word.korean: 그러므로 너희 총명한 자들아 내 말을 들으라 하나님은 단정코 악을 행치 아니하시며 전능자는 단정코 불의를 행치 아니하시고
word.tagalog: Kaya't dinggin ninyo ako, ninyong mga lalaking may unawa: malayo nawa sa Dios na siya'y gumawa ng masama; at sa Makapangyarihan sa lahat, na siya'y magkamit ng kasamaan.
word.maori: ¶ No reira whakarongo mai ki ahau, e nga tangata ngakau mohio: e kore rawa te Atua e mahi i te kino; e kore rawa hoki te Kaha Rawa e mahi i te he.
word.cebuano: Busa patalinghugi ako ninyo, kamo oh mga tawo nga masinabuton: Ipahalayo kana sa Dios, nga siya maghimo ug kadautan, Ug ipahalayo sa Makagagahum, nga magbuhat siya ug kasal-anan.
word.hebrew: י  לכן אנשי לבב--    שמעו-לי חללה לאל מרשע    ושדי מעול
word.hebrewmodern: לכן אנשי לבב שמעו לי חללה לאל מרשע ושדי מעול׃
word.greekot: διό συνετοὶ καρδίας ἀκούσατέ μου μή μοι εἴη ἔναντι κυρίου ἀσεβῆσαι καὶ ἔναντι παντοκράτορος ταράξαι τὸ δίκαιον

word.kjv: If now thou hast understanding, hear this: hearken to the voice of my words.
word.thailand: ถ้าท่านมีความเข้าใจ ขอฟังข้อนี้ ขอฟังเสียงถ้อยคำของข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Si pues hay en ti entendimiento, oye esto: Escucha la voz de mis palabras.
word.latinvulgate: Si habes ergo intellectum, audi quod dicitur, et ausculta vocem eloquii mei :
word.italian1927: Se tu se’ intelligente, ascolta questo, porgi orecchio alla voce delle mie parole.
word.german1912: Hast du nun Verstand, so höre das und merke auf die Stimme meiner Reden.
word.french1910: Si tu as de l'intelligence, écoute ceci, Prête l'oreille au son de mes paroles!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你若明理，就請聽這話，留心聽我說話的聲音。
word.korean: 만일 총명이 있거든 이것을 들으며 내 말소리에 귀를 기울이라
word.tagalog: Kung ngayon ay mayroon kang unawa ay dinggin mo ito: Dinggin mo ang tinig ng aking mga salita.
word.maori: ¶ Na ki te mea he ngakau mohio tou, whakarongo ki tenei; kia whai taringa mai ki te reo o aku kupu.
word.cebuano: Kong karon ikaw adunay salabutan, pamatia kini: Patalinghugi ang tingog sa akong mga pulong.
word.hebrew: טז  ואם-בינה שמעה-זאת    האזינה לקול מלי
word.hebrewmodern: ואם בינה שמעה זאת האזינה לקול מלי׃
word.greekot: εἰ δὲ μὴ νουθετῇ ἄκουε ταῦτα ἐνωτίζου φωνὴν ῥημάτων

word.kjv: Let men of understanding tell me, and let a wise man hearken unto me.
word.thailand: จงให้คนที่เข้าใจพูดกับข้าพเจ้า และให้คนฉลาดฟังข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Los hombres de seso dirán conmigo, Y el hombre sabio me oirá:
word.latinvulgate: Viri intelligentes loquantur mihi, et vir sapiens audiat me.
word.italian1927: La gente assennata e ogni uomo savio che m’ascolta, mi diranno:
word.german1912: Verständige Leute werden zu mir sagen und ein weiser Mann, der mir zuhört:
word.french1910: Les hommes de sens seront de mon avis, Le sage qui m'écoute pensera comme moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 明理的人必對我說，智慧的人要聽我的話。
word.korean: 총명한 자와 내 말을 듣는 모든 지혜 있는 자가 필연 내게 이르기를
word.tagalog: Mga taong may unawa ay magsasabi sa akin, Oo, bawa't pantas na taong nakakarinig sa akin:
word.maori: Ka korero mai nga tangata ngakau mahara ki ahau, ae ra, nga tangata whakaaro nui e whakarongo ana ki ahau:
word.cebuano: Mga tawo nga masinabuton moingon kanako: Oo, ang tagsatagsa ka tawo nga may kaalam mamati kanako:
word.hebrew: לד  אנשי לבב יאמרו לי    וגבר חכם שמע לי
word.hebrewmodern: אנשי לבב יאמרו לי וגבר חכם שמע לי׃
word.greekot: διὸ συνετοὶ καρδίας ἐροῦσιν ταῦτα ἀνὴρ δὲ σοφὸς ἀκήκοέν μου τὸ ῥῆμα

word.kjv: Where wast thou when I laid the foundations of the earth? declare, if thou hast understanding.
word.thailand: เมื่อเราวางรากฐานของแผ่นดินโลกนั้น เจ้าอยู่ที่ไหน ถ้าเจ้ามีความเข้าใจก็บอกเรามา
word.spanish1909: ¿Dónde estabas cuando yo fundaba la tierra? Házme lo saber, si tienes inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Ubi eras quando ponebam fundamenta terræ ? indica mihi, si habes intelligentiam.
word.italian1927: Dov’eri tu quand’io fondavo la terra? Dillo, se hai tanta intelligenza.
word.german1912: Wo warst du, da ich die Erde gründete? Sage an, bist du so klug!
word.french1910: Où étais-tu quand je fondais la terre? Dis-le, si tu as de l'intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 創造的奇妙我奠定大地根基的時候，你在哪裡呢？你若有聰明，就只管說吧。
word.korean: 그 새끼는 강하여져서 빈 들에서 길리우다가 나가고는 다시 돌아오지 아니하느니라
word.tagalog: Saan ka nandoon nang ilagay ko ang mga patibayan ng lupa? Ipahayag mo, kung mayroon kang unawa.
word.maori: ¶ I hea koia koe i ahau e whakatakoto ana i te turanga o te whenua? Whakaaturia mai, ki te mea e mohio ana koe ki te whakaaro.
word.cebuano: Diin ka man sa pagtukod ko sa kalibutan? Sumulti ka, kong daw anaay imong salabutan.
word.hebrew: ד  איפה היית ביסדי-ארץ    הגד אם-ידעת בינה
word.hebrewmodern: איפה היית ביסדי ארץ הגד אם ידעת בינה׃
word.greekot: ποῦ ἦς ἐν τῷ θεμελιοῦν με τὴν γῆν ἀπάγγειλον δέ μοι εἰ ἐπίστῃ σύνεσιν

word.kjv: Who hath put wisdom in the inward parts? or who hath given understanding to the heart?
word.thailand: ใครให้สติปัญญาภายใน หรือให้ความเข้าใจแก่จิตใจ
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién puso la sabiduría en el interior? ¿O quién dió al entendimiento la inteligencia?
word.latinvulgate: Quis posuit in visceribus hominis sapientiam ? vel quis dedit gallo intelligentiam ?
word.italian1927: Chi ha messo negli strati delle nubi sapienza, o chi ha dato intelletto alla meteora?
word.german1912: Wer gibt die Weisheit in das Verborgene? Wer gibt verständige Gedanken?
word.french1910: Qui a mis la sagesse dans le coeur, Ou qui a donné l'intelligence à l'esprit?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 誰把智慧放在懷裡，或把聰明賜於人的心中？
word.tagalog: Sinong naglagay ng karunungan sa mga pinakaloob na bahagi? O sinong nagbigay ng kaalaman sa pagiisip?
word.maori: Na wai i whakanoho nga whakaaro nunui ki nga wahi o roto? Na wai i homai nga mahara ki te ngakau?
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang nagbutang ug kaalam sa kinasulorang bahin? Kun kinsa ba ang naghatag ug salabutan sa utok?
word.hebrew: לו  מי-שת בטחות חכמה    או מי-נתן לשכוי בינה
word.hebrewmodern: מי שת בטחות חכמה או מי נתן לשכוי בינה׃
word.greekot: τίς δὲ ἔδωκεν γυναιξὶν ὑφάσματος σοφίαν ἢ ποικιλτικὴν ἐπιστήμην

word.kjv: Because God hath deprived her of wisdom, neither hath he imparted to her understanding.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเจ้าทรงกระทำให้มันลืมสติปัญญา และมิได้ทรงให้มันมีความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: (H39-20) Porque le privó Dios de sabiduría, Y no le dió inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Privavit enim eam Deus sapientia, nec dedit illi intelligentiam.
word.italian1927: ché Iddio l’ha privato di sapienza, e non gli ha impartito intelligenza.
word.german1912: Denn Gott hat ihm die Weisheit genommen und hat ihm keinen Verstand zugeteilt.
word.french1910: Car Dieu lui a refusé la sagesse, Il ne lui a pas donné l'intelligence en partage.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為　神使牠忘記了智慧，也沒有把聰明分給牠。
word.korean: 그 꼬리 치는 것은 백향목이 흔들리는 것 같고 그 넓적다리 힘줄은 서로 연락되었으며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't binawian siya ng Dios ng karunungan, ni hindi siya binahaginan ng unawa.
word.maori: No te mea i whakakahoretia e te Atua he ngakau mahara mona, kihai hoki i homai he whakaaro ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Tungod kay gikuhaan siya sa Dios ug kaalam, Ni gihatagan siya ug salabutan.
word.hebrew: יז  כי-השה אלוה חכמה    ולא-חלק לה בבינה
word.hebrewmodern: כי השה אלוה חכמה ולא חלק לה בבינה׃
word.greekot: ὅτι κατεσιώπησεν αὐτῇ ὁ θεὸς σοφίαν καὶ οὐκ ἐμέρισεν αὐτῇ ἐν τῇ συνέσει

word.kjv: Be ye not as the horse, or as the mule, which have no understanding: whose mouth must be held in with bit and bridle, lest they come near unto thee.
word.thailand: อย่าเป็นเหมือนม้าหรือล่อที่ปราศจากความเข้าใจ ซึ่งต้องติดสายผ่าปากและบังเหียน มิฉะนั้นมันก็มาถึงเจ้า
word.spanish1909: No seáis como el caballo, ó como el mulo, sin entendimiento: Con cabestro y con freno su boca ha de ser reprimida, Para que no lleguen á ti.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam ipse dixit, et facta sunt ; ipse mandavit et creata sunt.
word.italian1927: Non siate come il cavallo e come il mulo che non hanno intelletto, la cui bocca bisogna frenare con morso e con briglia, altrimenti non ti s’accostano!
word.german1912: Seid nicht wie Rosse und Maultiere, die nicht verständig sind, welchen man Zaum und Gebiß muß ins Maul legen, wenn sie nicht zu dir wollen.
word.french1910: Ne soyez pas comme un cheval ou un mulet sans intelligence; On les bride avec un frein et un mors, dont on les pare, Afin qu'ils ne s'approchent point de toi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你不可像無知的騾馬，如果不用嚼環轡頭勒住牠們，牠們就不肯走近。
word.korean: 너희는 무지한 말이나 노새 같이 되지 말지어다 그것들은 자갈과 굴레로 단속하지 아니하면 너희에게 가까이 오지 아니하리로다
word.tagalog: Huwag nawa kayong maging gaya ng kabayo, o gaya ng mula na walang unawa: na marapat igayak ng busal at ng paningkaw upang ipangpigil sa kanila, na kung dili'y hindi sila magsisilapit sa iyo.
word.maori: Kei rite koutou ki te hoiho, ki te muera ranei, kahore nei he matauranga; he mea kuku nei o raua kauae ki te paraire, ki te moka hei pupuri mai; ki te kore hoki, e kore e tata ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Ayaw kamo pagpanig-ingon sa kabayo kun sa mula, nga walay salabutan; Kang kansang ulo ug baba sa rinda ug bocado pagapugngan, Aron dili sila magaduol nganha kanimo.
word.hebrew: ט  אל-תהיו כסוס כפרד--    אין הבין במתג-ורסן עדיו לבלום    בל קרב אליך
word.hebrewmodern: אל תהיו כסוס כפרד אין הבין במתג ורסן עדיו לבלום בל קרב אליך׃
word.greekot: ὅτι αὐτὸς εἶπεν καὶ ἐγενήθησαν αὐτὸς ἐνετείλατο καὶ ἐκτίσθησαν

word.kjv: For God is the King of all the earth: sing ye praises with understanding.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเจ้าทรงเป็นกษัตริย์เหนือแผ่นดินโลกทั้งสิ้น จงร้องเพลงสรรเสริญด้วยความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Porque Dios es el Rey de toda la tierra: Cantad con inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Tremor apprehendit eos ; ibi dolores ut parturientis :
word.italian1927: Poiché Dio è re di tutta la terra; cantategli un bell’inno.
word.german1912: Denn Gott ist König auf dem ganzen Erdboden; lobsinget ihm klüglich!
word.french1910: Car Dieu est roi de toute la terre: Chantez un cantique!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為　神是全地的王，你們要用詩歌歌頌他。
word.korean: 하나님은 온 땅의 왕이심이라 지혜의 시로 찬양할지어다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang Dios ay Hari ng buong lupa: magsiawit kayo ng mga pagpuri na may pagunawa.
word.maori: Ko te Atua hoki te Kingi o te whenua katoa: himene atu i runga i te mohio.
word.cebuano: Kay ang Dios mao ang Hari sa tibook nga yuta: Manag-awit kamo ug mga pagdayeg uban ang salabutan.
word.hebrew: ז  זמרו אלהים זמרו    זמרו למלכנו זמרו
word.hebrewmodern: כי מלך כל הארץ אלהים זמרו משכיל׃
word.greekot: τρόμος ἐπελάβετο αὐτῶν ἐκεῖ ὠδῖνες ὡς τικτούσης

word.kjv: My mouth shall speak of wisdom; and the meditation of my heart shall be of understanding.
word.thailand: ปากของข้าพเจ้าจะเผยปัญญา การรำพึงของจิตใจข้าพเจ้าคือความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Mi boca hablará sabiduría; Y el pensamiento de mi corazón inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Deus manifeste veniet ; Deus noster, et non silebit. Ignis in conspectu ejus exardescet ; et in circuitu ejus tempestas valida.
word.italian1927: La mia bocca proferirà cose savie, e la meditazione del mio cuore sarà piena di senno.
word.german1912: Mein Mund soll von Weisheit reden und mein Herz von Verstand sagen.
word.french1910: Ma bouche va faire entendre des paroles sages, Et mon coeur a des pensées pleines de sens.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的口要說出智慧的話；我的心要默想明智的事。
word.korean: 내 입은 지혜를 말하겠고 내 마음은 명철을 묵상하리로다
word.tagalog: Ang aking bibig ay magsasalita ng karunungan; at ang pagbubulay ng aking puso ay magiging sa pagunawa.
word.maori: Ka whakapuakina he matauranga e toku mangai: a he ata ngarahu te whakaaro o toku ngakau.
word.cebuano: Ang akong baba magasulti sa kaalam; Ug ang pagpamalandong sa akong kasingkasing mao ang alang sa salabutan.
word.hebrew: ג  גם-בני אדם גם-בני-איש--    יחד עשיר ואביון
word.hebrewmodern: פי ידבר חכמות והגות לבי תבונות׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεὸς ἡμῶν καὶ οὐ παρασιωπήσεται πῦρ ἐναντίον αὐτοῦ καυθήσεται καὶ κύκλῳ αὐτοῦ καταιγὶς σφόδρα

word.kjv: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
word.thailand: ความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นที่เริ่มต้นของสติปัญญา บรรดาผู้ที่ปฏิบัติตามพระบัญญัติของพระองค์ก็ได้ความเข้าใจดี การสรรเสริญพระเจ้าดำรงอยู่เป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: El principio de la sabiduría es el temor de Jehová: Buen entendimiento tienen cuantos ponen aquéllos por obra: Su loor permanece para siempre.
word.latinvulgate: Peccator videbit, et irascetur, dentibus suis fremet et tabescet ; desiderium peccatorum peribit.
word.italian1927: Il timor dell’Eterno è il principio della sapienza; buon senno hanno tutti quelli che mettono in pratica la sua legge. La sua lode dimora in perpetuo.
word.german1912: Die Furcht des HERRN ist der Weisheit Anfang. Das ist eine feine Klugheit, wer darnach tut, des Lob bleibt ewiglich.
word.french1910: La crainte de l'Eternel est le commencement de la sagesse; Tous ceux qui l'observent ont une raison saine. Sa gloire subsiste à jamais.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏耶和華是智慧的開端；凡是這樣行的都是明智的。耶和華該受讚美，直到永遠。
word.korean: 여호와를 경외함이 곧 지혜의 근본이라 그 계명을 지키는 자는 다 좋은 지각이 있나니 여호와를 찬송함이 영원히 있으리로다
word.tagalog: Ang pagkatakot sa Panginoon ay pasimula ng karunungan; may mabuting pagkaunawa ang lahat na nagsisisunod ng kaniyang mga utos. Ang kaniyang kapurihan ay nananatili magpakailan man.
word.maori: Ko te timatanga o te whakaaro nui he wehi ki a Ihowa: he ngarahu nui to te hunga katoa nana era mahi; mau te whakamoemiti ki a ia, ake ake.
word.cebuano: Ang pagkahadlok kang Jehova mao ang sinugdanan sa kaalam; Ang tanan nga nanagtuman sa iyang mga sugo adunay maayong salabutan: Ang iyang pagdayeg nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: י  ראשית חכמה יראת יהוה--    שכל טוב לכל-עשיהם תהלתו    עמדת לעד
word.hebrewmodern: ראשית חכמה יראת יהוה שכל טוב לכל עשיהם תהלתו עמדת לעד׃
word.greekot: ἁμαρτωλὸς ὄψεται καὶ ὀργισθήσεται τοὺς ὀδόντας αὐτοῦ βρύξει καὶ τακήσεται ἐπιθυμία ἁμαρτωλῶν ἀπολεῖται

word.kjv: Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law; yea, I shall observe it with my whole heart.
word.thailand: ขอประทานความเข้าใจแก่ข้าพระองค์ และข้าพระองค์จะรักษาพระราชบัญญัติของพระองค์ไว้ ข้าพระองค์จะปฏิบัติพระราชบัญญัตินั้นด้วยสุดใจของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Dame entendimiento, y guardaré tu ley; Y la observaré de todo corazón.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Dammi intelletto e osserverò la tua legge; la praticherò con tutto il cuore.
word.german1912: Unterweise mich, daß ich bewahre dein Gesetz und halte es von ganzem Herzen.
word.french1910: Donne-moi l'intelligence, pour que je garde ta loi Et que je l'observe de tout mon coeur!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你賜我悟性，我好遵守你的律法，我必一心謹守。
word.korean: 주의 인자하신 대로 주의 종에게 행하사 주의 율례로 내게 가르치소서
word.tagalog: Bigyan mo ako ng pagkaunawa at aking iingatan ang iyong kautusan; Oo, aking susundin ng aking buong puso.
word.maori: Homai he matauranga ki ahau, a ka mau i ahau tau ture; ka whakapaua toku ngakau ki te pupuri.
word.cebuano: Hatagi ako ug salabutan, ug pagabantayan ko ang imong Kasugoan; Oo, pagatumanon ko kini uban sa bug-os ko nga kasingkasing.
word.hebrew: לד  הבינני ואצרה תורתך    ואשמרנה בכל-לב
word.hebrewmodern: הבינני ואצרה תורתך ואשמרנה בכל לב׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thy hands have made me and fashioned me: give me understanding, that I may learn thy commandments.
word.thailand: พระหัตถ์ของพระองค์ได้สร้างและสถาปนาข้าพระองค์ ขอประทานความเข้าใจแก่ข้าพระองค์เพื่อข้าพระองค์จะเรียนรู้พระบัญญัติของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: YOD. Tus manos me hicieron y me formaron: Hazme entender, y aprenderé tus mandamientos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Le tue mani m’hanno fatto e formato; dammi intelletto e imparerò i tuoi comandamenti.
word.german1912: Deine Hand hat mich gemacht und bereitet; unterweise mich, daß ich deine Gebote lerne.
word.french1910: Tes mains m'ont créé, elles m'ont formé; Donne-moi l'intelligence, pour que j'apprenne tes commandements!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 仰望　神的話必得安慰你的手造了我，建立了我；求你使我有悟性，可以學習你的命令。
word.korean: 주는 나의 원한을 펴시고 나를 구속하사 주의 말씀대로 나를 소성케 하소서
word.tagalog: Ginawa ako at inanyuan ako ng iyong mga kamay: bigyan mo ako ng unawa, upang matutuhan ko ang iyong mga utos.
word.maori: ¶ Na ou ringa ahau i hanga, i whakawhaiahua: homai he matauranga ki ahau, kia ako ai ahau ki au whakahau.
word.cebuano: Ang imong mga kamot nagbuhat kanako ug nag-umol kanako: Ihatag kanako ang salabutan, aron ako makakat-on sa imong mga sugo.
word.hebrew: עג  ידיך עשוני ויכוננוני    הבינני ואלמדה מצותיך
word.hebrewmodern: ידיך עשוני ויכוננוני הבינני ואלמדה מצותיך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์มีความเข้าใจมากกว่าบรรดาครูของข้าพระองค์ เพราะบรรดาพระโอวาทของพระองค์เป็นคำรำพึงของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Más que todos mis enseñadores he entendido: Porque tus testimonios son mi meditación.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io ho più intelletto di tutti i miei maestri, perché le tue testimonianze son la mia meditazione.
word.german1912: Ich bin gelehrter denn alle meine Lehrer; denn deine Zeugnisse sind meine Rede.
word.french1910: Je suis plus instruit que tous mes maîtres, Car tes préceptes sont l'objet de ma méditation.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我比我所有的老師明智，因為我默想你的法度。
word.korean: 내가 주의 증거를 지켰사오니 훼방과 멸시를 내게서 떠나게 하소서
word.tagalog: Ako'y may higit na unawa kay sa lahat ng tagapagturo sa akin; sapagka't ang iyong mga patotoo ay gunita ko.
word.maori: Nui atu oku mahara i o oku kaiwhakaako katoa: noku i whakaaroaro tonu ki au whakaaturanga.
word.cebuano: Aduna akoy labaw pang salabutan kay sa tanan ko nga mga magtutudlo; Kay ang imong mga pagpamatuod maoy akong gipalandong.
word.hebrew: צט  מכל-מלמדי השכלתי    כי עדותיך שיחה לי
word.hebrewmodern: מכל מלמדי השכלתי כי עדותיך שיחה לי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์ได้ความเข้าใจโดยข้อบังคับของพระองค์ เพราะฉะนั้นข้าพระองค์เกลียดชังวิถีเท็จทุกอย่าง
word.spanish1909: De tus mandamientos he adquirido inteligencia: Por tanto he aborrecido todo camino de mentira.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Mediante i tuoi precetti io divento intelligente; perciò odio ogni sentiero di falsità.
word.german1912: Dein Wort macht mich klug; darum hasse ich alle falschen Wege.
word.french1910: Par tes ordonnances je deviens intelligent, Aussi je hais toute voie de mensonge.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我藉著你的訓詞，得以明白事理；因此，我恨惡一切虛謊的道。
word.korean: 나로 주의 법도의 길을 깨닫게 하소서 그리하시면 내가 주의 기사를 묵상하리이다
word.tagalog: Sa iyong mga tuntunin ay nagkakamit ako ng unawa: kaya't aking ipinagtatanim ang bawa't lakad na sinungaling.
word.maori: Na au ako ahau i whai mohio ai: na reira ahau i kino ai ki nga ara teka katoa. NUNU
word.cebuano: Pinaagi sa imong mga lagda nakabaton ako ug salabutan: Tungod niini gidumtan ko ang tagsatagsa ka dalan sa kabakakan.
word.hebrew: קד  מפקודיך אתבונן    על כן שנאתי כל-ארח שקר
word.hebrewmodern: מפקודיך אתבונן על כן שנאתי כל ארח שקר׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: I am thy servant; give me understanding, that I may know thy testimonies.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์เป็นผู้รับใช้ของพระองค์ ขอทรงประทานความเข้าใจแก่ข้าพระองค์ เพื่อข้าพระองค์จะรู้ถึงบรรดาพระโอวาทของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Tu siervo soy yo, dame entendimiento; Para que sepa tus testimonios.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io sono tuo servitore; dammi intelletto, perché possa conoscere le tue testimonianze.
word.german1912: Ich bin dein Knecht; unterweise mich, daß ich erkenne deine Zeugnisse.
word.french1910: Je suis ton serviteur: donne-moi l'intelligence, Pour que je connaisse tes préceptes!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我是你的僕人，求你賜我悟性，使我可以明白你的法度。
word.korean: 또 나의 사랑하는 바 주의 계명에 내 손을 들고 주의 율례를 묵상하리이다
word.tagalog: Ako'y lingkod mo; bigyan mo ako ng unawa; upang aking maalaman ang mga patotoo mo,
word.maori: He pononga ahau nau; homai he mahara ki ahau, kia matau ai ki au whakaaturanga.
word.cebuano: Ako mao ang imong alagad; ihatag kanako ang salabutan, Aron nga ako mahibalo sa imong mga pagpamatuod.
word.hebrew: קכה  עבדך-אני הבינני    ואדעה עדתיך
word.hebrewmodern: עבדך אני הבינני ואדעה עדתיך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.
word.thailand: การคลี่คลายพระวจนะของพระองค์ให้ความสว่าง ทั้งให้ความเข้าใจแก่คนรู้น้อย
word.spanish1909: El principio de tus palabras alumbra; Hace entender á los simples.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: La dichiarazione delle tue parole illumina; dà intelletto ai semplici.
word.german1912: Wenn dein Wort offenbar wird, so erfreut es und macht klug die Einfältigen.
word.french1910: La révélation de tes paroles éclaire, Elle donne de l'intelligence aux simples.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你的話一解開，就發出亮光，使愚人有悟性。
word.korean: 주의 율법을 버린 악인들을 인하여 내가 맹렬한 노에 잡혔나이다
word.tagalog: Ang bukas ng iyong mga salita ay nagbibigay ng liwanag; nagbibigay ng unawa sa walang muwang.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te whakapuakanga o au kupu he homai marama; na reira i homai he mahara ki nga kuware.
word.cebuano: Ang sinugdan sa imong mga pulong nagahatag ug kahayag; Nagahatag kini ug salabutan alang sa mga walay-pagtagad.
word.hebrew: קל  פתח דבריך יאיר    מבין פתיים
word.hebrewmodern: פתח דבריך יאיר מבין פתיים׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: The righteousness of thy testimonies is everlasting: give me understanding, and I shall live.
word.thailand: บรรดาพระโอวาทของพระองค์ชอบธรรมเป็นนิตย์ ขอประทานความเข้าใจแก่ข้าพระองค์เพื่อข้าพระองค์จะดำรงชีวิตอยู่
word.spanish1909: Justicia eterna son tus testimonios; Dame entendimiento, y viviré.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Le tue testimonianze sono giuste in eterno; dammi intelletto ed io vivrò.
word.german1912: Die Gerechtigkeit deiner Zeugnisse ist ewig; unterweise mich, so lebe ich.
word.french1910: Tes préceptes sont éternellement justes: Donne-moi l'intelligence, pour que je vive!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你的法度永遠是公義的，求你賜我悟性，好讓我存活。
word.korean: 고난 당하기 전에는 내가 그릇 행하였더니 이제는 주의 말씀을 지키나이다
word.tagalog: Ang mga patotoo mo'y matuwid magpakailan man: bigyan mo ako ng unawa at mabubuhay ako.
word.maori: Pumau tonu te tika o au whakaaturanga: homai he mahara ki ahau, a ka ora ahau. KOPO
word.cebuano: Walay katapusan ang pagkamatarung sa imong mga pagpamatuod: Ihatag kanako ang salabutan ug ako mabuhi.
word.hebrew: קמד  צדק עדותיך לעולם    הבינני ואחיה
word.hebrewmodern: צדק עדותיך לעולם הבינני ואחיה׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Let my cry come near before thee, O LORD: give me understanding according to thy word.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอเสียงร้องทูลของข้าพระองค์ขึ้นมาต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระองค์ ขอประทานความเข้าใจแก่ข้าพระองค์ตามพระวจนะของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: TAU. Acérquese mi clamor delante de ti, oh Jehová: Dame entendimiento conforme á tu palabra.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Giunga il mio grido dinanzi a te, o Eterno; dammi intelletto secondo la tua parola.
word.german1912: HERR, laß meine Klage vor dich kommen; unterweise mich nach deinem Wort.
word.french1910: Que mon cri parvienne jusqu'à toi, ô Eternel! Donne-moi l'intelligence, selon ta promesse!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 祈願　神按應許施拯救耶和華啊！願我的呼求達到你面前；求你照著你的話賜我悟性。
word.korean: 주의 법이 나의 즐거움이 되지 아니하였더면 내가 내 고난 중에 멸망하였으리이다
word.tagalog: Dumating nawa sa harap mo ang aking daing, Oh Panginoon: bigyan mo ako ng unawa ayon sa iyong salita.
word.maori: ¶ Tukua atu taku tangi kia tata atu ki tou aroaro, e Ihowa: homai he mahara ki ahau, kia rite ki tau kupu.
word.cebuano: Ipahaduol ang akong pagtu-aw sa atubangan nimo, Oh Jehova Hatagi ako ug salabutan sumala sa imong pulong
word.hebrew: קסט  תקרב רנתי לפניך יהוה    כדברך הבינני
word.hebrewmodern: תקרב רנתי לפניך יהוה כדברך הבינני׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Great is our Lord, and of great power: his understanding is infinite.
word.thailand: องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าของเราใหญ่ยิ่งและทรงฤทธานุภาพอุดม ความเข้าใจของพระองค์นั้นวัดไม่ได้
word.spanish1909: Grande es el Señor nuestro, y de mucha potencia; Y de su entendimiento no hay número.
word.latinvulgate: Qui dat nivem sicut lanam, nebulam sicut cinerem spargit.
word.italian1927: Grande è il Signor nostro, e immenso è il suo potere; la sua intelligenza è infinita.
word.german1912: Der HERR ist groß und von großer Kraft; und ist unbegreiflich, wie er regiert.
word.french1910: Notre Seigneur est grand, puissant par sa force, Son intelligence n'a point de limite.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我們的主偉大，大有能力；他的智慧無法測度。
word.korean: 우리 주는 광대하시며 능력이 많으시며 그 지혜가 무궁하시도다
word.tagalog: Dakila ang ating Panginoon, at makapangyarihan sa kapangyarihan; ang kaniyang unawa ay walang hanggan,
word.maori: He nui to tatou Ariki, he nui hoki tona kaha: e kore e taea tona matauranga te whakaaro.
word.cebuano: Daku ang atong Ginoo, ug sa gahum nga dili hitupngan; Ug ang iyang salabutan walay kinutoban.
word.hebrew: ה  גדול אדונינו ורב-כח    לתבונתו אין מספר
word.hebrewmodern: גדול אדונינו ורב כח לתבונתו אין מספר׃
word.greekot: τοῦ διδόντος χιόνα ὡσεὶ ἔριον ὁμίχλην ὡσεὶ σποδὸν πάσσοντος

word.kjv: To know wisdom and instruction; to perceive the words of understanding;
word.thailand: เพื่อให้บรรลุปัญญาและคำสั่งสอน เพื่อให้เข้าใจถ้อยคำแห่งความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Para entender sabiduría y doctrina; Para conocer las razones prudentes;
word.latinvulgate: ad sciendam sapientiam et disciplinam ;
word.italian1927: perché l’uomo conosca la sapienza e l’istruzione, e intenda i detti sensati;
word.german1912: zu lernen Weisheit und Zucht, Verstand
word.french1910: Pour connaître la sagesse et l'instruction, Pour comprendre les paroles de l'intelligence;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要使人曉得智慧和教訓，了解充滿哲理的言語；
word.korean: 이는 지혜와 훈계를 알게 하며 명철의 말씀을 깨닫게 하며
word.tagalog: Upang umalam ng karunungan at turo; upang bulayin ang mga salita ng pagkaunawa;
word.maori: E mohiotia ai te whakaaro nui, te ako; e kitea ai nga kupu o te matauranga;
word.cebuano: Sa paghibalo sa kaalam ug pahamangno; Sa pag-ila sa mga pulong salabutan;
word.hebrew: ב  לדעת חכמה ומוסר    להבין אמרי בינה
word.hebrewmodern: לדעת חכמה ומוסר להבין אמרי בינה׃
word.greekot: γνῶναι σοφίαν καὶ παιδείαν νοῆσαί τε λόγους φρονήσεως

word.kjv: A wise man will hear, and will increase learning; and a man of understanding shall attain unto wise counsels:
word.thailand: ทั้งปราชญ์จะได้ยินและเพิ่มพูนการเรียนรู้ และคนที่มีความเข้าใจจะได้คำปรึกษาที่ฉลาด
word.spanish1909: Oirá el sabio, y aumentará el saber; Y el entendido adquirirá consejo;
word.latinvulgate: Audiens sapiens, sapientior erit, et intelligens gubernacula possidebit.
word.italian1927: Il savio ascolterà, e accrescerà il suo sapere; l’uomo intelligente ne ritrarrà buone direzioni
word.german1912: Wer weise ist der hört zu und bessert sich; wer verständig ist, der läßt sich raten,
word.french1910: Que le sage écoute, et il augmentera son savoir, Et celui qui est intelligent acquerra de l'habileté,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 使智慧人聽了，可以增長學問，使聰明人聽了，可以獲得智謀；
word.korean: 지혜있는 자는 듣고 학식이 더할 것이요 명철한 자는 모략을 얻을 것이라
word.tagalog: Upang marinig ng pantas, at lumago sa ikatututo: at upang tamuhin ng taong may unawa ang magagaling na payo:
word.maori: Kia whakarongo ai te tangata whakaaro nui, kia nui ake ai tona mohio; kia whiwhi ai te tangata tupato ki nga whakaaro mohio:
word.cebuano: Aron ang tawo nga manggialamon makadungog, ug magadugang sa kinaadman; Ug aron ang tawo nga masinabuton makabaton sa maayong mga tambag:
word.hebrew: ה  ישמע חכם ויוסף לקח    ונבון תחבלות יקנה
word.hebrewmodern: ישמע חכם ויוסף לקח ונבון תחבלות יקנה׃
word.greekot: τῶνδε γὰρ ἀκούσας σοφὸς σοφώτερος ἔσται ὁ δὲ νοήμων κυβέρνησιν κτήσεται

word.kjv: So that thou incline thine ear unto wisdom, and apply thine heart to understanding;
word.thailand: กระทำหูของเจ้าให้ผึ่งเพื่อรับปัญญา และเอียงใจของเจ้าเข้าหาความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Haciendo estar atento tu oído á la sabiduría; Si inclinares tu corazón á la prudencia;
word.latinvulgate: ut audiat sapientiam auris tua, inclina cor tuum ad cognoscendam prudentiam.
word.italian1927: prestando orecchio alla sapienza e inclinando il cuore all’intelligenza;
word.german1912: daß dein Ohr auf Weisheit achthat und du dein Herz mit Fleiß dazu neigest;
word.french1910: Si tu rends ton oreille attentive à la sagesse, Et si tu inclines ton coeur à l'intelligence;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 留心聽智慧，致力求聰明；
word.korean: 네 귀를 지혜에 기울이며 네 마음을 명철에 두며
word.tagalog: Na anopa't iyong ikikiling ang iyong pakinig sa karunungan, at ihihilig mo ang iyong puso sa pagunawa;
word.maori: A ka tahuri tou taringa ki te whakaaro nui, ka anga ano tou ngakau ki te matauranga;
word.cebuano: Aron nga ikiling mo ang imong igdulungog ngadto sa kaalam, Ug bansayon mo ang imong kasingkasing sa pagsabut;
word.hebrew: ב  להקשיב לחכמה אזנך    תטה לבך לתבונה
word.hebrewmodern: להקשיב לחכמה אזנך תטה לבך לתבונה׃
word.greekot: ὑπακούσεται σοφίας τὸ οὖς σου καὶ παραβαλεῖς καρδίαν σου εἰς σύνεσιν παραβαλεῖς δὲ αὐτὴν ἐπὶ νουθέτησιν τῷ υἱῷ σου

word.kjv: Yea, if thou criest after knowledge, and liftest up thy voice for understanding;
word.thailand: เออ ถ้าเจ้าร้องหาความรอบรู้ และเปล่งเสียงของเจ้าหาความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Si clamares á la inteligencia, Y á la prudencia dieres tu voz;
word.latinvulgate: Si enim sapientiam invocaveris, et inclinaveris cor tuum prudentiæ ;
word.italian1927: sì, se chiami il discernimento e rivolgi la tua voce all’intelligenza,
word.german1912: ja, so du mit Fleiß darnach rufest und darum betest;
word.french1910: Oui, si tu appelles la sagesse, Et si tu élèves ta voix vers l'intelligence,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 如果你為求哲理而呼喊，為求聰明而揚聲；
word.korean: 지식을 불러 구하며 명철을 얻으려고 소리를 높이며
word.tagalog: Oo, kung ikaw ay dadaing ng pagbubulay, at itataas mo ang iyong tinig sa pagunawa;
word.maori: Ae ra, ki te mea ka karangarangatia e koe te matauranga, a ka puaki tou reo ki te ngakau mohio;
word.cebuano: Oo, kong ikaw magasangpit sa salabutan, Ug magapatugbaw sa imong tingog alang sa pagpakasabut;
word.hebrew: ג  כי אם לבינה תקרא    לתבונה תתן קולך
word.hebrewmodern: כי אם לבינה תקרא לתבונה תתן קולך׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν γὰρ τὴν σοφίαν ἐπικαλέσῃ καὶ τῇ συνέσει δῷς φωνήν σου τὴν δὲ αἴσθησιν ζητήσῃς μεγάλῃ τῇ φωνῇ

word.kjv: For the LORD giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงประทานปัญญา ความรู้และความเข้าใจมาจากพระโอษฐ์ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque Jehová da la sabiduría, Y de su boca viene el conocimiento y la inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: quia Dominus dat sapientiam, et ex ore ejus prudentia et scientia.
word.italian1927: Poiché l’Eterno dà la sapienza; dalla sua bocca procedono la scienza e l’intelligenza.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR gibt Weisheit, und aus seinem Munde kommt Erkenntnis und Verstand.
word.french1910: Car l'Eternel donne la sagesse; De sa bouche sortent la connaissance et l'intelligence;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為耶和華賜人智慧，知識和聰明都出自他的口。
word.korean: 대저 여호와는 지혜를 주시며 지식과 명철을 그 입에서 내심이며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang Panginoon ay nagbibigay ng karunungan, sa kaniyang bibig nanggagaling ang kaalaman at kaunawaan:
word.maori: Ma Ihowa hoki e homai te whakaaro nui; no tona mangai te matauranga me te ngakau mohio.
word.cebuano: Kay si Jehova mohatag ug kaalam; Gikan sa iyang baba magagula ang kahibalo ug pagpakasabut:
word.hebrew: ו  כי-יהוה יתן חכמה    מפיו דעת ותבונה
word.hebrewmodern: כי יהוה יתן חכמה מפיו דעת ותבונה׃
word.greekot: ὅτι κύριος δίδωσιν σοφίαν καὶ ἀπὸ προσώπου αὐτοῦ γνῶσις καὶ σύνεσις

word.kjv: Discretion shall preserve thee, understanding shall keep thee:
word.thailand: ความเฉลียวฉลาดจะคอยเฝ้าเจ้า และความเข้าใจจะระแวดระวังเจ้าไว้
word.spanish1909: El consejo te guardará, Te preservará la inteligencia:
word.latinvulgate: consilium custodiet te, et prudentia servabit te ;
word.italian1927: la riflessione veglierà su te, e l’intelligenza ti proteggerà;
word.german1912: guter Rat wird dich bewahren, und Verstand wird dich behüten,
word.french1910: La réflexion veillera sur toi, L'intelligence te gardera,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 明辨的能力必護衛你，聰明必看顧你；
word.korean: 근신이 너를 지키며 명철이 너를 보호하여
word.tagalog: Kabaitan ay magbabantay sa iyo, pagkaunawa ay magiingat sa iyo:
word.maori: Ka ai te ngarahu pai hei tiaki i a koe, te ngakau mohio hei pupuri i a koe;
word.cebuano: Ang pagkabuotan magabantay sa ibabaw nimo; Ang pagpakasabut magahupot kanimo:
word.hebrew: יא  מזמה תשמר עליך    תבונה תנצרכה
word.hebrewmodern: מזמה תשמר עליך תבונה תנצרכה׃
word.greekot: βουλὴ καλὴ φυλάξει σε ἔννοια δὲ ὁσία τηρήσει σε

word.kjv: So shalt thou find favour and good understanding in the sight of God and man.
word.thailand: ดังนั้น เจ้าจะพบความโปรดปรานและความเข้าใจอันดีในสายพระเนตรพระเจ้าและในสายตามนุษย์
word.spanish1909: Y hallarás gracia y buena opinión En los ojos de Dios y de los hombres.
word.latinvulgate: et invenies gratiam, et disciplinam bonam, coram Deo et hominibus.
word.italian1927: troverai così grazia e buon senno agli occhi di Dio e degli uomini.
word.german1912: so wirst du Gunst und Klugheit finden, die Gott und Menschen gefällt.
word.french1910: Tu acquerras ainsi de la grâce et une raison saine, Aux yeux de Dieu et des hommes.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這樣，你在　神和世人眼前，必蒙恩寵，得著美名（“名”原文作“明慧”）。
word.korean: 그리하면 네가 하나님과 사람 앞에서 은총과 귀중히 여김을 받으리라
word.tagalog: Sa gayo'y makakasumpong ka ng lingap at mabuting kaunawaan, sa paningin ng Dios at ng tao.
word.maori: Penei ka whiwhi koe ki te atawhai, ki te matauranga pai i te aroaro o te Atua, o te tangata.
word.cebuano: Aron ikaw makakaplag sa kalomo ug maayong salabutan Sa atubangan sa Dios aug sa tawo.
word.hebrew: ד  ומצא-חן ושכל-טוב--    בעיני אלהים ואדם
word.hebrewmodern: ומצא חן ושכל טוב בעיני אלהים ואדם׃
word.greekot: καὶ προνοοῦ καλὰ ἐνώπιον κυρίου καὶ ἀνθρώπων

word.kjv: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
word.thailand: จงวางใจในพระเยโฮวาห์ด้วยสุดใจของเจ้า และอย่าพึ่งพาความเข้าใจของตนเอง
word.spanish1909: Fíate de Jehová de todo tu corazón, Y no estribes en tu prudencia.
word.latinvulgate: Habe fiduciam in Domino ex toto corde tuo, et ne innitaris prudentiæ tuæ.
word.italian1927: Confidati nell’Eterno con tutto il cuore, e non t’appoggiare sul tuo discernimento.
word.german1912: Verlaß dich auf den HERRN von ganzem Herzen und verlaß dich nicht auf deinen Verstand;
word.french1910: Confie-toi en l'Eternel de tout ton coeur, Et ne t'appuie pas sur ta sagesse;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要一心仰賴耶和華，不可倚靠自己的聰明；
word.korean: 너는 마음을 다하여 여호와를 의뢰하고 네 명철을 의지하지 말라
word.tagalog: Tumiwala ka sa Panginoon ng buong puso mo, at huwag kang manalig sa iyong sariling kaunawaan:
word.maori: Whakapaua tou ngakau ki te whakawhirinaki ki a Ihowa, kaua hoki e okioki ki tou matauranga ake.
word.cebuano: Sumalig ka kang Jehova sa bug-os mong kasingkasing, Ug ayaw pagsalig sa imong kaugagalingong salabutan:
word.hebrew: ה  בטח אל-יהוה בכל-לבך    ואל-בינתך אל-תשען
word.hebrewmodern: בטח אל יהוה בכל לבך ואל בינתך אל תשען׃
word.greekot: ἴσθι πεποιθὼς ἐν ὅλῃ καρδίᾳ ἐπὶ θεῷ ἐπὶ δὲ σῇ σοφίᾳ μὴ ἐπαίρου

word.kjv: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding.
word.thailand: มนุษย์ผู้ประสบปัญญาและผู้ได้ความเข้าใจ เป็นสุขจริงหนอ
word.spanish1909: Bienaventurado el hombre que halla la sabiduría, Y que obtiene la inteligencia:
word.latinvulgate: Beatus homo qui invenit sapientiam, et qui affluit prudentia.
word.italian1927: Beato l’uomo che ha trovato la sapienza, e l’uomo che ottiene l’intelligenza!
word.german1912: Wohl dem Menschen, der Weisheit findet, und dem Menschen, der Verstand bekommt!
word.french1910: Heureux l'homme qui a trouvé la sagesse, Et l'homme qui possède l'intelligence!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 得智慧遠勝得金銀得著智慧，獲致聰明的人，是有福的。
word.korean: 지혜를 얻은 자와 명철을 얻은 자는 복이 있나니
word.tagalog: Mapalad ang tao na nakakasumpong ng karunungan, at ang tao na nagtatamo ng kaunawaan.
word.maori: ¶ Ka hari te tangata kua kitea nei e ia te whakaaro nui, me te tangata ano kua whiwhi ki te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Malipayon ang tawo nga makakaplag sa kaalam, Ug ang tawo nga makakab-ut sa pagsabut.
word.hebrew: יג  אשרי אדם מצא חכמה    ואדם יפיק תבונה
word.hebrewmodern: אשרי אדם מצא חכמה ואדם יפיק תבונה׃
word.greekot: μακάριος ἄνθρωπος ὃς εὗρεν σοφίαν καὶ θνητὸς ὃς εἶδεν φρόνησιν

word.kjv: The LORD by wisdom hath founded the earth; by understanding hath he established the heavens.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงวางรากแผ่นดินโลกโดยปัญญา พระองค์ทรงสถาปนาฟ้าสวรรค์โดยความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Jehová con sabiduría fundó la tierra; Afirmó los cielos con inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Dominus sapientia fundavit terram, stabilivit cælos prudentia.
word.italian1927: Con la sapienza l’Eterno fondò la terra, e con l’intelligenza rese stabili i cieli.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR hat die Erde durch Weisheit gegründet und durch seinen Rat die Himmel bereitet.
word.french1910: C'est par la sagesse que l'Eternel a fondé la terre, C'est par l'intelligence qu'il a affermi les cieux;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華以智慧奠定大地，以聰明堅立高天。
word.korean: 여호와께서는 지혜로 땅을 세우셨으며 명철로 하늘을 굳게 펴셨고
word.tagalog: Nilikha ng Panginoon ang lupa sa pamamagitan ng karunungan; itinatag niya ang langit sa pamamagitan ng kaunawaan.
word.maori: Na te whakaaro nui o Ihowa i whakaturia ai e ia te whenua; na tona mohio tana whakapumautanga i nga rangi.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova pinaagi sa kaalam mitukod sa yuta; Pinaagi sa pagsabut iyang gitukod ang kalangitan.
word.hebrew: יט  יהוה--בחכמה יסד-ארץ    כונן שמים בתבונה
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה בחכמה יסד ארץ כונן שמים בתבונה׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεὸς τῇ σοφίᾳ ἐθεμελίωσεν τὴν γῆν ἡτοίμασεν δὲ οὐρανοὺς ἐν φρονήσει

word.kjv: Hear, ye children, the instruction of a father, and attend to know understanding.
word.thailand: บุตรทั้งหลายเอ๋ย จงฟังคำสั่งสอนของพ่อเจ้า ให้ตั้งใจฟังเพื่อเจ้าจะได้รับความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: OID, hijos, la doctrina de un padre, Y estad atentos para que conozcáis cordura.
word.latinvulgate: Audite, filii, disciplinam patris, et attendite ut sciatis prudentiam.
word.italian1927: Figliuoli, ascoltate l’istruzione di un padre, e state attenti a imparare il discernimento;
word.german1912: Höret, meine Kinder, die Zucht eures Vaters; merket auf, daß ihr lernt und klug werdet!
word.french1910: Ecoutez, mes fils, l'instruction d'un père, Et soyez attentifs, pour connaître la sagesse;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 持定訓誨、不偏左右孩子們，要聽父親的教訓，留心學習哲理；
word.korean: 아들들아 아비의 훈계를 들으며 명철을 얻기에 주의하라
word.tagalog: Dinggin ninyo, mga anak ko, ang turo ng ama, at makinig kayo upang matuto ng kaunawaan:
word.maori: ¶ Whakarongo, e aku tamariki, ki te whakaako a te matua, tahuri mai hoki kia matauria ai nga whakaaro mohio.
word.cebuano: Pamatia, mga anak ko , ang pahamatngon sa usa ka amahan, Ug matngoni ang pagkahibalo sa pagsabut:
word.hebrew: א  שמעו בנים מוסר אב    והקשיבו לדעת בינה
word.hebrewmodern: שמעו בנים מוסר אב והקשיבו לדעת בינה׃
word.greekot: ἀκούσατε παῖδες παιδείαν πατρὸς καὶ προσέχετε γνῶναι ἔννοιαν

word.kjv: Get wisdom, get understanding: forget it not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.
word.thailand: อย่าลืมและอย่าหันกลับจากถ้อยคำแห่งปากของเรา จงเอาปัญญา และเอาความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Adquiere sabiduría, adquiere inteligencia; No te olvides ni te apartes de las razones de mi boca;
word.latinvulgate: Posside sapientiam, posside prudentiam. Ne obliviscaris, neque declines a verbis oris mei.
word.italian1927: Acquista sapienza, acquista intelligenza; non dimenticare le parole della mia bocca, e non te ne sviare;
word.german1912: Nimm an Weisheit, nimm an Verstand; vergiß nicht und weiche nicht von der Rede meines Mundes.
word.french1910: Acquiers la sagesse, acquiers l'intelligence; N'oublie pas les paroles de ma bouche, et ne t'en détourne pas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要求取智慧和哲理，不可忘記，也不可偏離我口中的話。
word.korean: 지혜를 얻으며 명철을 얻으라 내 입의 말을 잊지 말며 어기지 말라
word.tagalog: Magtamo ka ng karunungan, magtamo ka ng kaunawaan; huwag mong kalimutan, ni humiwalay man sa mga salita ng aking bibig:
word.maori: Whaia mou te whakaaro nui, whaia mou te matauranga; kaua e wareware ki tera, kaua hoki e neke atu i nga kupu a toku mangai.
word.cebuano: Batoni ang kaalam, batoni ang pagsabut; Ayaw hikalimti, ni pag-ayran mo ang mga pulong nga gikan sa akong baba;
word.hebrew: ה  קנה חכמה קנה בינה    אל-תשכח ואל-תט מאמרי-פי
word.hebrewmodern: קנה חכמה קנה בינה אל תשכח ואל תט מאמרי פי׃
word.greekot: φύλασσε ἐντολάς μὴ ἐπιλάθῃ μηδὲ παρίδῃς ῥῆσιν ἐμοῦ στόματος

word.kjv: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.
word.thailand: ปัญญาเป็นสิ่งสำคัญที่สุด ฉะนั้นจงเอาปัญญา แม้เจ้าจะได้อะไรก็ตาม จงเอาความเข้าใจไว้

word.korean: 지혜가 제일이니 지혜를 얻으라 ! 무릇 너의 얻은 것을 가져 명철을 얻을지니라
word.tagalog: Karunungan ay pinaka pangulong bagay; kaya't kunin mo ang karunungan: Oo, sa lahat mong kukunin ay kunin mo ang unawa.
word.maori: Ko te whakaaro nui te tino mea; no reira whaia mau te whakaaro nui; a i ou whiwhinga katoa, kia whiwhi koe ki te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ang kaalam maoy labaw nga butang; busa batoni ang kaalam; Oo, uban sa tanan mo nga pagatinguhaon batoni ang pagsabut.
word.hebrew: ז  ראשית חכמה קנה חכמה    ובכל-קנינך קנה בינה

word.french1910: Mon fils, sois attentif à ma sagesse, Prête l'oreille à mon intelligence,

word.italian1927: Ma chi commette un adulterio è privo di senno; chi fa questo vuol rovinar se stesso.

word.hebrewmodern: אמר לחכמה אחתי את ומדע לבינה תקרא׃

word.kjv: And beheld among the simple ones, I discerned among the youths, a young man void of understanding,

word.kjv: O ye simple, understand wisdom: and, ye fools, be ye of an understanding heart.
